word.italian1927: Coll’aiuto di Dio celebrerò la sua parola; coll’aiuto dell’Eterno celebrerò la sua parola.
word.german1912: Ich will rühmen Gottes Wort; ich will rühmen des HERRN Wort.
word.french1910: Je me glorifierai en Dieu, en sa parole; Je me glorifierai en l'Eternel, en sa parole;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 靠著　神，我要讚美他的話；靠著耶和華，我要讚美他的話。
word.korean: 내가 하나님을 의지하여 그 말씀을 찬송하며 여호와를 의지하여 그 말씀을 찬송하리이다
word.tagalog: Sa Dios (ay pupuri ako ng salita), sa Panginoon (ay pupuri ako ng salita),
word.maori: Ma te Atua ahau ka whakamoemiti ai ki tana kupu; ma Ihowa ahau ka whakamoemiti ai ki tana kupu.
word.cebuano: Sa Dios (ako magadayeg sa iyang pulong), Kang Jehova (ako magadayeg sa iyang pulong),
word.hebrew: י  אז ישובו אויבי אחור ביום אקרא    זה-ידעתי כי-אלהים לי
word.hebrewmodern: באלהים אהלל דבר ביהוה אהלל דבר׃
word.greekot: ἐξομολογήσομαί σοι ἐν λαοῖς κύριε ψαλῶ σοι ἐν ἔθνεσιν

word.kjv: Thy vows are upon me, O God: I will render praises unto thee.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเจ้า ที่ข้าพระองค์ปฏิญาณไว้นั้น ข้าพระองค์จะทำตาม ข้าพระองค์จะถวายคำสรรเสริญแด่พระองค์
word.spanish1909: Sobre mí, oh Dios, están tus votos: Te tributaré alabanzas.
word.latinvulgate: Exaltare super cælos, Deus, et super omnem terram gloria tua.
word.italian1927: Tengo presenti i voti che t’ho fatti, o Dio; io t’offrirò sacrifizi di lode;
word.german1912: Ich habe dir, Gott, gelobt, daß ich dir danken will;
word.french1910: O Dieu! je dois accomplir les voeux que je t'ai faits; Je t'offrirai des actions de grâces.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神啊！我要償還我向你所許的願，我要把感謝祭獻給你。
word.korean: 하나님이여, 내가 주께 서원함이 있사온즉 내가 감사제를 주께 드리리니
word.tagalog: Ang iyong mga panata ay sa akin, Oh Dios: ako'y magbabayad ng mga handog na pasalamat sa iyo.
word.maori: Kei ahau nga kupu taurangi ki a koe, e te Atua: me tuku e ahau nga whakamoemiti ki a koe.
word.cebuano: Sa ibabaw nako, ania ang imong mga panaad, Oh Dios: Pagahatagan ko ikaw sa mga halad-sa-pasalamat.
word.hebrew: יב  באלהים בטחתי לא אירא    מה-יעשה אדם לי
word.hebrewmodern: עלי אלהים נדריך אשלם תודת לך׃
word.greekot: ὑψώθητι ἐπὶ τοὺς οὐρανούς ὁ θεός καὶ ἐπὶ πᾶσαν τὴν γῆν ἡ δόξα σου

word.kjv: My heart is fixed, O God, my heart is fixed: I will sing and give praise.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเจ้า จิตใจของข้าพระองค์มั่นคง จิตใจของข้าพระองค์มั่นคง ข้าพระองค์จะร้องเพลงและร้องเพลงสรรเสริญ
word.spanish1909: Pronto está mi corazón, oh Dios, mi corazón está dispuesto: Cantaré, y trovaré salmos.
word.latinvulgate: Deus conteret dentes eorum in ore ipsorum ; molas leonum confringet Dominus.
word.italian1927: Il mio cuore è ben disposto, o Dio, il mio cuore è ben disposto; io canterò e salmeggerò.
word.german1912: Mein Herz ist bereit, Gott, mein Herz ist bereit, daß ich singe und lobe.
word.french1910: Mon coeur est affermi, ô Dieu! mon coeur est affermi; Je chanterai, je ferai retentir mes instruments.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神啊！我的心堅定，我的心堅定；我要歌唱，我要頌讚。
word.korean: 하나님이여, 내 마음이 확정되었고 내 마음이 확정되었사오니 내가 노래하고 내가 찬송하리이다
word.tagalog: Ang aking puso ay matatag, Oh Dios, ang aking puso ay matatag: ako'y aawit, oo, ako'y aawit ng mga pagpuri.
word.maori: ¶ Pamau tonu toku ngakau, e te Atua, pumau tonu toku ngakau: ka waiata ahau, ae, ka himene ahau.
word.cebuano: Malig-on na ang akong kasing-kasing, Oh Dios, malig-on na ang akong kasingkasing: Magaawit ako, oo, magaawit ako ug mga pagdayeg.
word.hebrew: ז  רשת הכינו לפעמי--    כפף נפשי כרו לפני שיחה    נפלו בתוכה סלה
word.hebrewmodern: נכון לבי אלהים נכון לבי אשירה ואזמרה׃
word.greekot: ὁ θεὸς συνέτριψεν τοὺς ὀδόντας αὐτῶν ἐν τῷ στόματι αὐτῶν τὰς μύλας τῶν λεόντων συνέθλασεν κύριος

word.kjv: I will praise thee, O Lord, among the people: I will sing unto thee among the nations.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่องค์พระผู้เป็นเจ้า ข้าพระองค์จะสรรเสริญพระองค์ท่ามกลางประชาชาติ ข้าพระองค์จะร้องเพลงสรรเสริญพระองค์ท่ามกลางชนชาติทั้งหลาย
word.spanish1909: Alabarte he en los pueblos, oh Señor; Cantaré de ti en las naciones.
word.latinvulgate: Sicut cera quæ fluit auferentur ; supercecidit ignis, et non viderunt solem.
word.italian1927: Io ti celebrerò fra i popoli, o Signore, a te salmeggerò fra le nazioni,
word.german1912: HERR, ich will dir danken unter den Völkern; ich will dir lobsingen unter den Leuten.
word.french1910: Je te louerai parmi les peuples, Seigneur! Je te chanterai parmi les nations.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 主啊！我要在萬民中稱謝你，在萬族中歌頌你。
word.korean: 주여, 내가 만민 중에서 주께 감사하오며 열방 중에서 주를 찬송하리이다
word.tagalog: Ako'y magpapasalamat sa iyo, Oh Panginoon, sa gitna ng mga bayan: ako'y aawit sa iyo ng mga pagpuri sa gitna ng mga bansa.
word.maori: Ka whakamoemiti ahau ki a koe, e te Ariki, i waenganui i nga iwi; ka himene ki a koe i waenganui i nga tauiwi.
word.cebuano: Magahatag ako ug mga pasalamat kanimo, Oh Ginoo, taliwala sa mga katawohan: Magaawit ako ug mga pagdayeg kanimo sa taliwala sa mga nasud.
word.hebrew: ט  עורה כבודי--עורה הנבל וכנור    אעירה שחר
word.hebrewmodern: אודך בעמים אדני אזמרך בל אמים׃
word.greekot: ὡσεὶ κηρὸς ὁ τακεὶς ἀνταναιρεθήσονται ἐπέπεσε πῦρ καὶ οὐκ εἶδον τὸν ἥλιον

word.kjv: So will I sing praise unto thy name for ever, that I may daily perform my vows.
word.thailand: แล้วข้าพระองค์จะร้องเพลงสรรเสริญพระนามของพระองค์เสมอ ตามที่ข้าพระองค์ทำตามคำปฏิญาณอยู่แต่ละวันนั้น
word.spanish1909: Así cantaré tu nombre para siempre, Pagando mis votos cada día.
word.latinvulgate: In Deo salutare meum et gloria mea ; Deus auxilii mei, et spes mea in Deo est.
word.italian1927: così salmeggerò al tuo nome in perpetuo, e adempirò ogni giorno i miei voti.
word.german1912: So will ich deinem Namen lobsingen ewiglich, daß ich meine Gelübde bezahle täglich.
word.french1910: Alors je chanterai sans cesse ton nom, En accomplissant chaque jour mes voeux.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 這樣，我要永遠歌頌你的名，並且天天還我向你所許的願。
word.korean: 그리하시면 내가 주의 이름을 영원히 찬양하며 매일 나의 서원을 이행하리이다
word.tagalog: Sa gayo'y aawit ako ng pagpuri sa iyong pangalan magpakailan man. Upang maisagawa ko araw-araw ang aking mga panata.
word.maori: Penei ka himene ahau ki tou ingoa ake ake: ka whakamana e ahau aku kupu taurangi i tenei ra, i tenei ra.
word.cebuano: Sa ingon niini magaawit ako ug pagdayeg sa imong ngalan sa walay katapusan, Aron makatuman ako sa matag-adlaw sa akong mga panaad.
word.hebrew: ח  ישב עולם לפני אלהים    חסד ואמת מן ינצרהו [ (Psalms 61:9) ט  כן אזמרה שמך לעד--    לשלמי נדרי יום יום ]
word.hebrewmodern: כן אזמרה שמך לעד לשלמי נדרי יום יום׃
word.greekot: ἐπὶ τῷ θεῷ τὸ σωτήριόν μου καὶ ἡ δόξα μου ὁ θεὸς τῆς βοηθείας μου καὶ ἡ ἐλπίς μου ἐπὶ τῷ θεῷ

word.kjv: Because thy lovingkindness is better than life, my lips shall praise thee.
word.thailand: เพราะว่าความเมตตาของพระองค์ดีกว่าชีวิต ริมฝีปากของข้าพระองค์จะสรรเสริญพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Porque mejor es tu misericordia que la vida: Mis labios te alabarán.
word.latinvulgate: Protexisti me a conventu malignantium, a multitudine operantium iniquitatem.
word.italian1927: Poiché la tua benignità val meglio della vita; le mie labbra ti loderanno.
word.german1912: Denn deine Güte ist besser denn Leben; meine Lippen preisen dich.
word.french1910: Car ta bonté vaut mieux que la vie: Mes lèvres célèbrent tes louanges.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因你的慈愛比生命更好，我的嘴唇要頌讚你。
word.korean: 주의 인자가 생명보다 나으므로 내 입술이 주를 찬양할 것이라
word.tagalog: Sapagka't ang iyong kagandahang-loob ay mainam kay sa buhay: pupurihin ka ng aking mga labi.
word.maori: ¶ Pai atu tou aroha i te ora: mo reira ka whakamoemiti oku ngutu ki a koe.
word.cebuano: Tungod kay ang imong mahigugmaong-kalolot labi pang maayo kay sa kinabuhi, Ang akong mga ngabil magadayeg kanimo.
word.hebrew: ג  כן בקדש חזיתך--    לראות עזך וכבודך
word.hebrewmodern: כי טוב חסדך מחיים שפתי ישבחונך׃
word.greekot: ἐσκέπασάς με ἀπὸ συστροφῆς πονηρευομένων ἀπὸ πλήθους ἐργαζομένων τὴν ἀνομίαν

word.kjv: My soul shall be satisfied as with marrow and fatness; and my mouth shall praise thee with joyful lips:
word.thailand: จิตใจของข้าพระองค์จะอิ่มหนำดังกินไขกระดูกและไขมัน และปากของข้าพระองค์จะสรรเสริญพระองค์ด้วยริมฝีปากที่ชื่นบาน
word.spanish1909: Como de meollo y de grosura será saciada mi alma; Y con labios de júbilo te alabará mi boca,
word.latinvulgate: ut sagittent in occultis immaculatum.
word.italian1927: L’anima mia sarà saziata come di midollo e di grasso, e la mia bocca ti loderà con labbra giubilanti.
word.german1912: Das wäre meines Herzens Freude und Wonne, wenn ich dich mit fröhlichem Munde loben sollte. {~}
word.french1910: Mon âme sera rassasiée comme de mets gras et succulents, Et, avec des cris de joie sur les lèvres, ma bouche te célébrera.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我的心滿足，就像飽享了骨髓肥油；我要用歡樂的嘴唇讚美你。
word.korean: 골수와 기름진 것을 먹음과 같이 내 영혼이 만족할 것이라 내 입이 기쁜 입술로 주를 찬송하되
word.tagalog: Ang kaluluwa ko'y matutuwa na gaya sa utak at taba; at ang bibig ko'y pupuri sa iyo ng masayang mga labi;
word.maori: Ka makona toku wairua, ano i te hinu wheua, i te ngako, a ka hari oku ngutu ina whakamoemiti toku mangai ki a koe.
word.cebuano: Ang akong kalag mabusog nga maingon sa utok ug sa tambok; Ug ang akong baba magadayeg kanimo uban ang mga ngabil nga malipayon;
word.hebrew: ה  כן אברכך בחיי    בשמך אשא כפי
word.hebrewmodern: כמו חלב ודשן תשבע נפשי ושפתי רננות יהלל פי׃
word.greekot: τοῦ κατατοξεῦσαι ἐν ἀποκρύφοις ἄμωμον ἐξάπινα κατατοξεύσουσιν αὐτὸν καὶ οὐ φοβηθήσονται

word.kjv: Sing forth the honour of his name: make his praise glorious.
word.thailand: จงร้องเพลงถวายพระเกียรติแด่พระนามของพระองค์ จงถวายสรรเสริญอย่างรุ่งเรืองต่อพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Cantad la gloria de su nombre: Poned gloria en su alabanza.
word.latinvulgate: Deus misereatur nostri, et benedicat nobis ; illuminet vultum suum super nos, et misereatur nostri ;
word.italian1927: Cantate la gloria del suo nome, rendete gloriosa la sua lode!
word.german1912: Lobsinget zu Ehren seinem Namen; rühmet ihn herrlich!
word.french1910: Chantez la gloire de son nom, Célébrez sa gloire par vos louanges!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你們要歌頌他名的榮耀，把榮耀和讚美都歸給他。
word.korean: 그 이름의 영광을 찬양하고 영화롭게 찬송할지어다
word.tagalog: Awitin ninyo ang kaluwalhatian ng kaniyang pangalan: paluwalhatiin ninyo ang pagpuri sa kaniya.
word.maori: Himenetia te kororia o tona ingoa, kia whai kororia te whakamoemiti ki a ia.
word.cebuano: Awita ninyo ang himaya sa iyang ngalan: Himoa ninyo nga mahimayaon ang iyang pagdayeg.
word.hebrew: ב  זמרו כבוד-שמו    שימו כבוד תהלתו
word.hebrewmodern: זמרו כבוד שמו שימו כבוד תהלתו׃
word.greekot: ὁ θεὸς οἰκτιρήσαι ἡμᾶς καὶ εὐλογήσαι ἡμᾶς ἐπιφάναι τὸ πρόσωπον αὐτοῦ ἐφ' ἡμᾶς διάψαλμα

word.kjv: O bless our God, ye people, and make the voice of his praise to be heard:
word.thailand: ชนชาติทั้งหลายเอ๋ย จงสรรเสริญพระเจ้าของเรา จงให้ได้ยินเสียงสรรเสริญพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Bendecid, pueblos, á nuestro Dios, Y haced oir la voz de su alabanza.
word.latinvulgate: Benedicat nos Deus, et metuant eum omnes fines terræ.
word.italian1927: Benedite il nostro Dio, o popoli, e fate risonar la voce della sua lode!
word.german1912: Lobet, ihr Völker, unsern Gott; lasset seinen Ruhm weit erschallen,
word.french1910: Peuples, bénissez notre Dieu, Faites retentir sa louange!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 萬民哪！你們要稱頌我們的　神，宣揚讚美他的聲音。
word.korean: 만민들아 ! 우리 하나님을 송축하며 그 송축소리로 들리게 할찌어다
word.tagalog: Oh purihin ninyo ang ating Dios, ninyong mga bayan, at iparinig ninyo ang tinig ng kaniyang kapurihan:
word.maori: ¶ Whakapaingia to tatou Atua, e nga iwi; kia rangona te reo whakamoemiti ki a ia.
word.cebuano: Oh dayega ninyo, mga katawohan, ang atong Dios, Ug himoa nga madungog ang tingog sa pagdayeg kaniya;
word.hebrew: ח  ברכו עמים אלהינו    והשמיעו קול תהלתו
word.hebrewmodern: ברכו עמים אלהינו והשמיעו קול תהלתו׃
word.greekot: εὐλογήσαι ἡμᾶς ὁ θεός καὶ φοβηθήτωσαν αὐτὸν πάντα τὰ πέρατα τῆς γῆς

word.kjv: Let the people praise thee, O God; let all the people praise thee.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเจ้า ขอชนชาติทั้งหลายสรรเสริญพระองค์ ให้ชนชาติทั้งหลายสรรเสริญพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Alábente los pueblos, oh Dios; Alábente los pueblos todos.
word.latinvulgate: Sicut deficit fumus, deficiant ; sicut fluit cera a facie ignis, sic pereant peccatores a facie Dei.
word.italian1927: Ti celebrino i popoli, o Dio, tutti quanti i popoli ti celebrino!
word.german1912: Es danken dir, Gott, die Völker; es danken dir alle Völker.
word.french1910: Les peuples te louent, ô Dieu! Tous les peuples te louent.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神啊！願眾民都稱謝你，願萬民都稱謝你。
word.korean: 하나님이여, 민족들로 주를 찬송케 하시며 모든 민족으로 주를 찬송케 하소서
word.tagalog: Purihin ka ng mga bayan, Oh Dios; purihin ka ng lahat ng mga bayan.
word.maori: Kia whakamoemiti nga iwi ki a koe, e te Atua, kia whakamoemiti nga iwi katoa ki a koe.
word.cebuano: Padayega kanimo ang mga katawohan, Oh Dios; Padayega kanimo ang mga katawohan nga tanan.
word.hebrew: ג  לדעת בארץ דרכך    בכל-גוים ישועתך
word.hebrewmodern: יודוך עמים אלהים יודוך עמים כלם׃
word.greekot: ὡς ἐκλείπει καπνός ἐκλιπέτωσαν ὡς τήκεται κηρὸς ἀπὸ προσώπου πυρός οὕτως ἀπόλοιντο οἱ ἁμαρτωλοὶ ἀπὸ προσώπου τοῦ θεοῦ

word.kjv: Let the people praise thee, O God; let all the people praise thee.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเจ้า ขอชนชาติทั้งหลายสรรเสริญพระองค์ ให้ชนชาติทั้งหลายสรรเสริญพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Alábente los pueblos, oh Dios: Todos los pueblos te alaben.
word.latinvulgate: Cantate Deo, psalmum dicite nomini ejus ; iter facite ei qui ascendit super occasum. Dominus nomen illi ; exsultate in conspectu ejus. Turbabuntur a facie ejus,
word.italian1927: Ti celebrino i popoli, o Dio, tutti quanti i popoli ti celebrino!
word.german1912: Es danken dir, Gott, die Völker; es danken dir alle Völker.
word.french1910: Les peuples te louent, ô Dieu! Tous les peuples te louent.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神啊！願眾民都稱謝你，願萬民都稱謝你。
word.korean: 하나님이여, 민족들로 주를 찬송케 하시며 모든 민족으로 주를 찬송케 하소서
word.tagalog: Purihin ka ng mga bayan, Oh Dios; purihin ka ng lahat ng mga bayan.
word.maori: Kia whakamoemiti nga iwi ki a koe, e te Atua, kia whakamoemiti nga iwi katoa ki a koe.
word.cebuano: Padayega kanimo ang mga katawoha, Oh Dios; Padayega ang tanang mga katawohan kanimo.
word.hebrew: ה  ישמחו וירננו    לאמים כי-תשפט עמים מישר    ולאמים בארץ תנחם סלה
word.hebrewmodern: יודוך עמים אלהים יודוך עמים כלם׃
word.greekot: ᾄσατε τῷ θεῷ ψάλατε τῷ ὀνόματι αὐτοῦ ὁδοποιήσατε τῷ ἐπιβεβηκότι ἐπὶ δυσμῶν κύριος ὄνομα αὐτῷ καὶ ἀγαλλιᾶσθε ἐνώπιον αὐτοῦ ταραχθήσονται ἀπὸ προσώπου αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: Sing unto God, sing praises to his name: extol him that rideth upon the heavens by his name JAH, and rejoice before him.
word.thailand: จงร้องเพลงถวายพระเจ้า จงร้องเพลงสรรเสริญพระนามของพระองค์ จงยกย่องพระองค์ผู้ทรงเมฆเป็นพาหนะโดยพระนามของพระองค์คือพระเยโฮวาห์ จงลิงโลดต่อเบื้องพระพักตร์พระองค์
word.spanish1909: Cantad á Dios, cantad salmos á su nombre: Ensalzad al que sube sobre los cielos En JAH su nombre, y alegraos delante de él.
word.latinvulgate: Laboravi clamans, raucæ factæ sunt fauces meæ ; defecerunt oculi mei, dum spero in Deum meum.
word.italian1927: Cantate a Dio, salmeggiate al suo nome, preparate la via a colui che cavalca attraverso i deserti; il suo nome è: l’Eterno, ed esultate dinanzi a lui.
word.german1912: Singet Gott, lobsinget seinem Namen! Machet Bahn dem, der durch die Wüste herfährt-er heißt HERR -,und freuet euch vor ihm,
word.french1910: Chantez à Dieu, célébrez son nom! Frayez le chemin à celui qui s'avance à travers les plaines! L'Eternel est son nom: réjouissez-vous devant lui!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你們要向　神歌唱，歌頌他的名；為那乘車經過曠野的預備道路（本句或譯：“高舉那乘駕雲彩之上的”）；他的名是耶和華，你們要在他面前歡樂。
word.korean: 하나님께 노래하며 그 이름을 찬양하라 타고 광야에 행하시던 자를 위하여 대로를 수축하라 그 이름은 여호와시니 그 앞에서 뛰놀지어다
word.tagalog: Kayo'y magsiawit sa Dios, kayo'y magsiawit ng kapurihan sa kaniyang pangalan: ipaghanda ninyo ng maluwang na lansangan siya na nangangabayo sa mga ilang; ang kaniyang pangalan ay JAH; at mangagalak kayo sa harap niya.
word.maori: Waiata ki te Atua, himenetia tona ingoa; opehia ake he huanui mo tana hariata i nga koraha; tona ingoa ko IHA; kia hari hoki ki tona aroaro.
word.cebuano: Manag-awit kamo sa Dios, manag-awit kamo ug mga pagdayeg sa iyang ngalan: Pagbutang ug usa ka dalan alang kaniya nga molabay ngadto sa mga kamingawan; Si Jehova mao ang iyang ngalan; ug managhimaya kamo sa atubangan niya.
word.hebrew: ד  וצדיקים--ישמחו יעלצו לפני אלהים    וישישו בשמחה
word.hebrewmodern: שירו לאלהים זמרו שמו סלו לרכב בערבות ביה שמו ועלזו לפניו׃
word.greekot: ἐκοπίασα κράζων ἐβραγχίασεν ὁ λάρυγξ μου ἐξέλιπον οἱ ὀφθαλμοί μου ἀπὸ τοῦ ἐλπίζειν ἐπὶ τὸν θεόν μου

word.kjv: Sing unto God, ye kingdoms of the earth; O sing praises unto the Lord; Selah:
word.thailand: บรรดาอาณาจักรแห่งแผ่นดินโลกเอ๋ย จงร้องเพลงถวายพระเจ้า จงร้องเพลงสรรเสริญองค์พระผู้เป็นเจ้า เซลาห์
word.spanish1909: Reinos de la tierra, cantad á Dios, Cantad al Señor (Selah);
word.latinvulgate: et placebit Deo super vitulum novellum, cornua producentem et ungulas.
word.italian1927: O regni della terra, cantate a Dio, salmeggiate al Signore, Sela.
word.german1912: Ihr Königreiche auf Erden, singet Gott, lobsinget dem HERRN (Sela),
word.french1910: Royaumes de la terre, chantez à Dieu, Célébrez le Seigneur! -Pause.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 地上的萬國啊！你們要歌頌　神，你們要頌揚主。（細拉）
word.korean: 땅의 열방들아 하나님께 노래하고 주께 찬송할지어다 (셀라)
word.tagalog: Magsiawit kayo sa Dios, kayong mga kaharian sa lupa; Oh magsiawit kayo ng mga pagpuri sa Panginoon.
word.maori: ¶ Waiata ki te Atua, e nga rangatiratanga o te whenua: himene ki te Ariki: (Hera.
word.cebuano: Pag-awit kamo ngadto sa Dios, kamong mga gingharian sa yuta: Oh pag-awit kamo ug mga pagdayeg ngadto sa Ginoo; (Selah)
word.hebrew: לב  יאתיו חשמנים מני מצרים    כוש תריץ ידיו לאלהים
word.hebrewmodern: ממלכות הארץ שירו לאלהים זמרו אדני סלה׃
word.greekot: καὶ ἀρέσει τῷ θεῷ ὑπὲρ μόσχον νέον κέρατα ἐκφέροντα καὶ ὁπλάς

word.kjv: I will praise the name of God with a song, and will magnify him with thanksgiving.
word.thailand: ข้าพเจ้าจะสรรเสริญพระนามพระเจ้าด้วยบทเพลง ข้าพเจ้าจะยกย่องพระองค์โดยโมทนาพระคุณ
word.spanish1909: Alabaré yo el nombre de Dios con cántico, Ensalzarélo con alabanza.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Io celebrerò il nome di Dio con un canto, e lo magnificherò con le mie lodi.
word.german1912: Ich will den Namen Gottes loben mit einem Lied und will ihn hoch ehren mit Dank.
word.french1910: Je célébrerai le nom de Dieu par des cantiques, Je l'exalterai par des louanges.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我要用詩歌讚美　神的名，以感謝尊他為大。
word.korean: 내가 노래로 하나님의 이름을 찬송하며 감사함으로 하나님을 광대하시다 하리니
word.tagalog: Aking pupurihin ng awit ang pangalan ng Dios, at dadakilain ko siya ng pasalamat.
word.maori: ¶ Ka whakamoemiti taku waiata ki te ingoa o te Atua, ka whakanui ano taku whakawhetai i a ia.
word.cebuano: Pagadayegon ko ang ngalan sa Dios uban sa usa ka awit, Ug pagapadakuon siya uban sa pagpasalamat.
word.hebrew: ל  ואני עני וכואב    ישועתך אלהים תשגבני
word.hebrewmodern: אהללה שם אלהים בשיר ואגדלנו בתודה׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Let the heaven and earth praise him, the seas, and everything that moveth therein.
word.thailand: ขอฟ้าสวรรค์และแผ่นดินโลกสรรเสริญพระองค์ ทั้งทะเลและสรรพสิ่งที่เคลื่อนไหวอยู่ในนั้น
word.spanish1909: Alábenlo los cielos y la tierra, Los mares, y todo lo que se mueve en ellos.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Lo lodino i cieli e la terra, i mari e tutto ciò che si muove in essi!
word.german1912: Es lobe ihn Himmel, Erde und Meer und alles, was sich darin regt.
word.french1910: Que les cieux et la terre le célèbrent, Les mers et tout ce qui s'y meut!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 願天和地都讚美他，願海洋和海中一切生物都讚美他。
word.korean: 천지가 그를 찬송할 것이요 바다와 그 중의 모든 동물도 그리할지로다
word.tagalog: Purihin siya ng langit at lupa, ng mga dagat, at ng bawa't bagay na gumagalaw roon.
word.maori: Kia whakamoemiti te rangi me te whenua ki a ia, nga moana, me nga mea katoa e tere ana i roto.
word.cebuano: Padayega kaniya ang langit ug ang yuta, Ang kadagatan, ug ang tanang mga nagalihok diha kanila.
word.hebrew: לד  כי-שמע אל-אביונים יהוה    ואת-אסיריו לא בזה
word.hebrewmodern: יהללוהו שמים וארץ ימים וכל רמש בם׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: By thee have I been holden up from the womb: thou art he that took me out of my mother's bowels: my praise shall be continually of thee.
word.thailand: ข้าพระองค์พึ่งพระองค์ตั้งแต่กำเนิด พระองค์ทรงเป็นผู้นำข้าพระองค์มาจากครรภ์มารดาข้าพระองค์ ข้าพระองค์จะสรรเสริญพระองค์เสมอ
word.spanish1909: Por ti he sido sustentado desde el vientre: De las entrañas de mi madre tú fuiste el que me sacaste: De ti será siempre mi alabanza.
word.latinvulgate: Descendet sicut pluvia in vellus, et sicut stillicidia stillantia super terram.
word.italian1927: Tu sei stato il mio sostegno fin dal seno materno, sei tu che m’hai tratto dalle viscere di mia madre; tu sei del continuo l’oggetto della mia lode.
word.german1912: Auf dich habe ich mich verlassen von Mutterleibe an; du hast mich aus meiner Mutter Leib gezogen. Mein Ruhm ist immer von dir.
word.french1910: Dès le ventre de ma mère je m'appuie sur toi; C'est toi qui m'as fait sortir du sein maternel; tu es sans cesse l'objet de mes louanges.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我自出母胎就倚賴你，把我從母腹中領出來的就是你，我要常常讚美你。
word.korean: 내가 모태에서부터 주의 붙드신 바 되었으며 내 어미 배에서 주의 취하여 내신 바 되었사오니 나는 항상 주를 찬송하리이다 !
word.tagalog: Sa pamamagitan mo ay naalalayan ako mula sa bahay-bata: ikaw ang kumuha sa akin sa tiyan ng aking ina: ang pagpuri ko'y magiging laging sa iyo.
word.maori: Nau ahau i tautoko ake no te kopu mai ano; nau ahau i tango mai i roto i nga whekau o toku whaea; ko koe taku e whakamoemiti tonu ai.
word.cebuano: Pinaagi kanimo nasapnay ako gikan sa tagoangkan; Ikaw mao ang nagkuha kanako gikan sa ginhawahan sa akong inahan: Ang akong pagdayeg magapadayon gihapon kanimo.
word.hebrew: ו  עליך נסמכתי מבטן--ממעי אמי אתה גוזי    בך תהלתי תמיד
word.hebrewmodern: עליך נסמכתי מבטן ממעי אמי אתה גוזי בך תהלתי תמיד׃
word.greekot: καὶ καταβήσεται ὡς ὑετὸς ἐπὶ πόκον καὶ ὡσεὶ σταγόνες στάζουσαι ἐπὶ τὴν γῆν

word.kjv: Let my mouth be filled with thy praise and with thy honour all the day.
word.thailand: ขอให้ปากของข้าพระองค์เต็มไปด้วยการสรรเสริญพระองค์ และถวายเกียรติแด่พระองค์วันยังค่ำ
word.spanish1909: Sea llena mi boca de tu alabanza, De tu gloria todo el día.
word.latinvulgate: Et dominabitur a mari usque ad mare, et a flumine usque ad terminos orbis terrarum.
word.italian1927: Sia la mia bocca ripiena della tua lode, e celebri ogni giorno la tua gloria!
word.german1912: Laß meinen Mund deines Ruhmes und deines Preises voll sein täglich.
word.french1910: Que ma bouche soit remplie de tes louanges, Que chaque jour elle te glorifie!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我要滿口讚美你，我終日頌揚你的榮美。
word.korean: 주를 찬송함과 주를 존숭함이 종일토록 내 입에 가득하리이다
word.tagalog: Ang bibig ko'y mapupuno ng pagpuri sa iyo, at ng iyong karangalan buong araw.
word.maori: Kia ki toku mangai i te whakamoemiti ki a koe, i tou honore i te roa o te ra.
word.cebuano: Ang akong baba mapuno sa pagdayeg kanimo, Ug sa pagpasidungog kanimo sa tibook nga adlaw.
word.hebrew: ח  ימלא פי תהלתך    כל-היום תפארתך
word.hebrewmodern: ימלא פי תהלתך כל היום תפארתך׃
word.greekot: καὶ κατακυριεύσει ἀπὸ θαλάσσης ἕως θαλάσσης καὶ ἀπὸ ποταμοῦ ἕως περάτων τῆς οἰκουμένης

word.kjv: But I will hope continually, and will yet praise thee more and more.
word.thailand: แต่ข้าพระองค์จะหวังอยู่ตลอดไป และจะสรรเสริญพระองค์มากยิ่งขึ้นๆ
word.spanish1909: Mas yo siempre esperaré, Y añadiré sobre toda tu alabanza.
word.latinvulgate: Ex usuris et iniquitate redimet animas eorum, et honorabile nomen eorum coram illo.
word.italian1927: Ma io spererò del continuo, e a tutte le tue lodi ne aggiungerò delle altre.
word.german1912: Ich aber will immer harren und will immer deines Ruhmes mehr machen.
word.french1910: Et moi, j'espérerai toujours, Je te louerai de plus en plus.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 至於我，我要常常仰望你，要多多讚美你。
word.korean: 나는 항상 소망을 품고 주를 더욱 찬송하리이다
word.tagalog: Nguni't ako'y maghihintay na palagi, at pupuri pa ako sa iyo ng higit at higit.
word.maori: ¶ Ko ahau ia, ka tumanako tonu: ka hono tonu ano te whakamoemiti ki a koe.
word.cebuano: Apan ako magapadayon sa paglaum, Ug magadugang gayud ang akong pagdayeg kanimo.
word.hebrew: יד  ואני תמיד איחל    והוספתי על-כל-תהלתך
word.hebrewmodern: ואני תמיד איחל והוספתי על כל תהלתך׃
word.greekot: ἐκ τόκου καὶ ἐξ ἀδικίας λυτρώσεται τὰς ψυχὰς αὐτῶν καὶ ἔντιμον τὸ ὄνομα αὐτῶν ἐνώπιον αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: I will also praise thee with the psaltery, even thy truth, O my God: unto thee will I sing with the harp, O thou Holy One of Israel.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเจ้าของข้าพระองค์ ฝ่ายข้าพระองค์จะสรรเสริญพระองค์ด้วยพิณใหญ่ถึงเรื่องความจริงของพระองค์ ข้าแต่องค์บริสุทธิ์แห่งอิสราเอล ข้าพระองค์จะร้องเพลงสรรเสริญพระองค์ด้วยพิณเขาคู่
word.spanish1909: Asimismo yo te alabaré con instrumento de salterio, Oh Dios mío: tu verdad cantaré yo á ti en el arpa, Oh Santo de Israel.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Io altresì ti celebrerò col saltèro, celebrerò la tua verità, o mio Dio! A te salmeggerò con la cetra, o Santo d’Israele!
word.german1912: So danke ich auch dir mit Psalterspiel für deine Treue, mein Gott; ich lobsinge dir auf der Harfe, du Heiliger in Israel.
word.french1910: Et je te louerai au son du luth, je chanterai ta fidélité, mon Dieu, Je te célébrerai avec la harpe, Saint d'Israël!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我的　神啊！我要彈琴稱讚你，稱讚你的信實；以色列的聖者啊！我要鼓瑟歌頌你。
word.korean: 나의 하나님이여, 내가 또 비파를 주를 찬양하며 주의 성실을 찬양하리이다 이스라엘의 거룩하신 주여, 내가 수금으로 주를 찬양 하리이다
word.tagalog: Pupurihin din kita ng salterio, ang iyong katotohanan, Oh Dios ko; sa iyo'y aawit ako ng mga kapurihan sa pamamagitan ng alpa, Oh ikaw na Banal ng Israel.
word.maori: Ka whakamoemiti ahau ki a koe i runga i te hatere, ara ki tou pono, e toku Atua: ka himene ahau ki a koe i runga i te hapa, e te Mea Tapu o Iharaira.
word.cebuano: Magadayeg usab ako kanimo uban ang salterio, Bisan ang imong kamatuoran, Oh akong Dios: Kanimo magaawit ako ug mga pagdayeg uban sa alpa, Oh ikaw nga Balaan sa Israel.
word.hebrew: כב  גם-אני אודך בכלי-נבל--    אמתך אלהי אזמרה לך בכנור--    קדוש ישראל
word.hebrewmodern: גם אני אודך בכלי נבל אמתך אלהי אזמרה לך בכנור קדוש ישראל׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: And he shall live, and to him shall be given of the gold of Sheba: prayer also shall be made for him continually; and daily shall he be praised.
word.thailand: ท่านผู้นั้นจะมีชีวิตยืนนาน คนจะถวายทองคำเมืองเชบาแก่ท่าน เขาจะอธิษฐานเผื่อท่านเรื่อยไป และจะอวยพรท่านวันยังค่ำ
word.spanish1909: Y vivirá, y darásele del oro de Seba; Y oraráse por él continuamente; Todo el día se le bendecirá.
word.latinvulgate: Si dicebam : Narrabo sic ; ecce nationem filiorum tuorum reprobavi.
word.italian1927: Egli vivrà; e a lui sarà dato dell’oro di Sceba, e la gente pregherà per lui tuttodì, lo benedirà del continuo.
word.german1912: Er wird leben, und man wird ihm von Gold aus Reicharabien geben. Und man wird immerdar für ihn beten; täglich wird man ihn segnen.
word.french1910: Ils vivront, et lui donneront de l'or de Séba; Ils prieront pour lui sans cesse, ils le béniront chaque jour.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 願他長久活著，願人把示巴的金子奉給他，願人為他不住禱告，終日給他祝福。
word.korean: 저희가 생존하여 스바의 금을 저에게 드리며 사람들이 저를 위하여 항상 기도하고 종일 찬송하리로다
word.tagalog: At siya'y mabubuhay at sa kaniya'y ibibigay ang ginto ng Sheba: at dadalanginang lagi siya ng mga tao: pupurihin nila siya buong araw.
word.maori: A e ora ratou; ka hoatu ano ki a ia he koura no Hepa: ka tukua tonutia hoki te inoi mona; ka whakapaingia ia i tenei ra, i tenei ra.
word.cebuano: Ug mabuhi sila; ug kaniya igahatag ang bulawan sa Sheba: Ug ang mga tawo magapadayon sa pag-ampo alang kaniya; Magapadayon sila sa pagdayeg kaniya sa tibook nga adlaw.
word.hebrew: טו  ויחי--    ויתן-לו מזהב שבא ויתפלל בעדו תמיד    כל-היום יברכנהו
word.hebrewmodern: ויחי ויתן לו מזהב שבא ויתפלל בעדו תמיד כל היום יברכנהו׃
word.greekot: εἰ ἔλεγον διηγήσομαι οὕτως ἰδοὺ τῇ γενεᾷ τῶν υἱῶν σου ἠσυνθέτηκα

word.kjv: O let not the oppressed return ashamed: let the poor and needy praise thy name.
word.thailand: ขออย่าให้ผู้ที่ถูกบีบบังคับได้อาย ขอให้คนจนและคนขัดสนสรรเสริญพระนามของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: No vuelva avergonzado el abatido: El afligido y el menesteroso alabarán tu nombre.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: L’oppresso non se ne torni svergognato; fa’ che il misero e il bisognoso lodino il tuo nome.
word.german1912: Laß den Geringen nicht in Schanden davongehen; laß die Armen und Elenden rühmen deinen Namen.
word.french1910: Que l'opprimé ne retourne pas confus! Que le malheureux et le pauvre célèbrent ton nom!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 不要使受欺壓的人蒙羞回去，要使困苦、貧窮的人讚美你的名。
word.korean: 학대 받은 자로 부끄러이 돌아가게 마시고 가난한 자와 궁핍한 자로 주의 이름을 찬송케 하소서
word.tagalog: Oh huwag bumalik na may kahihiyan ang naaapi: pupurihin ng dukha at mapagkailangan ang iyong pangalan.
word.maori: Kei hoki whakama mai te tangata e tukinotia ana: kia whakamoemititia tou ingoa e te ware, e te rawakore.
word.cebuano: Oh dili mo itugot nga ang gidaug-daug magabalik sa kaulawan: Papagdayega ang mga kabus ug ang mga hangul sa imong ngalan.
word.hebrew: כא  אל-ישב דך נכלם    עני ואביון יהללו שמך
word.hebrewmodern: אל ישב דך נכלם עני ואביון יהללו שמך׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: But I will declare for ever; I will sing praises to the God of Jacob.
word.thailand: แต่ข้าพเจ้าจะประกาศเป็นนิตย์ ข้าพเจ้าจะร้องเพลงสรรเสริญพระเจ้าของยาโคบ
word.spanish1909: Mas yo anunciaré siempre, Cantaré alabanzas al Dios de Jacob.
word.latinvulgate: De cælo auditum fecisti judicium : terra tremuit et quievit
word.italian1927: Ma io proclamerò del continuo queste cose, salmeggerò all’Iddio di Giacobbe;
word.german1912: Ich aber will verkündigen ewiglich und lobsingen dem Gott Jakobs.
word.french1910: Je publierai ces choses à jamais; Je chanterai en l'honneur du Dieu de Jacob. -
word.chinesencvtraditional: 至於我，我要永遠傳揚，我要向雅各的　神歌唱。
word.korean: 또 악인의 뿔을 다 베고 의인의 뿔은 높이 들리로다
word.tagalog: Nguni't aking ipahahayag magpakailan man, ako'y aawit ng mga kapurihan sa Dios ni Jacob.
word.maori: Ko ahau ia, ka kauwhau tonu: ka himene ki te Atua o Hakopa.
word.cebuano: Apan ako magamantala sa walay katapusan, Magaawit ako ug mga pagdayeg sa Dios ni Jacob.
word.hebrew: ט  כי כוס ביד-יהוה ויין חמר מלא מסך--    ויגר מזה אך-שמריה ימצו ישתו    כל רשעי-ארץ
word.hebrewmodern: ואני אגיד לעלם אזמרה לאלהי יעקב׃
word.greekot: ἐκ τοῦ οὐρανοῦ ἠκούτισας κρίσιν γῆ ἐφοβήθη καὶ ἡσύχασεν

word.kjv: Surely the wrath of man shall praise thee: the remainder of wrath shalt thou restrain.
word.thailand: แน่ละ ความโกรธของมนุษย์จะสรรเสริญพระองค์ และความโกรธที่เหลืออยู่นั้นพระองค์จะทรงยับยั้งไว้
word.spanish1909: Ciertamente la ira del hombre te acarreará alabanza: Tú reprimirás el resto de las iras.
word.latinvulgate: aut obliviscetur misereri Deus ? aut continebit in ira sua misericordias suas ?
word.italian1927: Certo, il furore degli uomini ridonderà alla tua lode; ti cingerai degli ultimi avanzi dei loro furori.
word.german1912: Wenn Menschen wider dich wüten, bist du auch noch gerüstet.
word.french1910: L'homme te célèbre même dans sa fureur, Quand tu te revêts de tout ton courroux.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 人的忿怒必使你得稱讚，人的餘怒必成為你的裝飾。
word.korean: 진실로 사람의 노는 장차 주를 찬송하게 될 것이요 그 남은 노는 주께서 금하시리이다
word.tagalog: Tunay na pupurihin ka ng poot ng tao: ang nalabi sa poot ay ibibigkis mo sa iyo.
word.maori: He pono ka whai kororia koe i te riri o te tangata: mau ano e whitiki te toenga o te riri.
word.cebuano: Sa pagkamatuod gayud ang kaligutgut sa tawo magadayeg kanimo: Ang nahabilin sa imong kaligutgut imong igabakus sa ibabaw nimo.
word.hebrew: י  בקום-למשפט אלהים--    להושיע כל-ענוי-ארץ סלה
word.hebrewmodern: כי חמת אדם תודך שארית חמת תחגר׃
word.greekot: ἢ ἐπιλήσεται τοῦ οἰκτιρῆσαι ὁ θεὸς ἢ συνέξει ἐν τῇ ὀργῇ αὐτοῦ τοὺς οἰκτιρμοὺς αὐτοῦ διάψαλμα

word.kjv: We will not hide them from their children, shewing to the generation to come the praises of the LORD, and his strength, and his wonderful works that he hath done.
word.thailand: เราจะไม่ซ่อนไว้จากลูกหลานของเขา แต่จะบอกแก่ชั่วอายุที่กำลังเกิดมา ถึงการสรรเสริญพระเยโฮวาห์ และฤทธานุภาพของพระองค์ และการมหัศจรรย์ซึ่งพระองค์ได้ทรงกระทำ
word.spanish1909: No las encubriremos á sus hijos, Contando á la generación venidera las alabanzas de Jehová, Y su fortaleza, y sus maravillas que hizo.
word.latinvulgate: Facti sumus opprobrium vicinis nostris, subsannatio et illusio his qui in circuitu nostro sunt.
word.italian1927: non lo celeremo ai loro figliuoli; diremo alla generazione avvenire le lodi dell’Eterno, e la sua potenza e le maraviglie ch’egli ha operato.
word.german1912: daß wir's nicht verhalten sollten ihren Kindern, die hernach kommen, und verkündigten den Ruhm des HERRN und seine Macht und seine Wunder, die er getan hat.
word.french1910: Nous ne le cacherons point à leurs enfants; Nous dirons à la génération future les louanges de l'Eternel, Et sa puissance, et les prodiges qu'il a opérés.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我們不把這些事向他們的子孫隱瞞，卻要把耶和華應得的讚美、他的能力，和他所行的奇事，都向後代的人述說。
word.korean: 우리가 이를 그 자손에게 숨기지 아니하고 여호와의 영예와 그 능력과 기이한 사적을 후대에 전하리로다
word.tagalog: Hindi namin ikukubli sa kanilang mga anak, na isasaysay sa salin ng lahing darating ang mga pagpuri sa Panginoon, at ang kaniyang kalakasan, at ang kaniyang mga kagilagilalas na mga gawa na kaniyang ginawa.
word.maori: E kore e huna e matou i a ratou tamariki: me whakaatu ki to muri whakatupuranga nga whakamoemiti ki a Ihowa, me tona kaha, me ana mahi whakamiharo i mea ai ia.
word.cebuano: Dili kami magatago kanila gikan sa ilang mga anak, Sa pagsugilon sa kaliwatan nga umalabut sa mga pagdayeg ni Jehova, Ug sa iyang kusog, ug sa iyang katingalahang mga buhat nga iyang gihimo.
word.hebrew: ד  לא נכחד מבניהם--    לדור אחרון מספרים תהלות יהוה ועזוזו ונפלאתיו    אשר עשה
word.hebrewmodern: לא נכחד מבניהם לדור אחרון מספרים תהלות יהוה ועזוזו ונפלאותיו אשר עשה׃
word.greekot: ἐγενήθημεν ὄνειδος τοῖς γείτοσιν ἡμῶν μυκτηρισμὸς καὶ χλευασμὸς τοῖς κύκλῳ ἡμῶν

word.kjv: So we thy people and sheep of thy pasture will give thee thanks for ever: we will shew forth thy praise to all generations.
word.thailand: แล้วข้าพระองค์ทั้งหลายประชาชนของพระองค์ ฝูงแพะแกะแห่งทุ่งหญ้าของพระองค์ จะโมทนาพระคุณพระองค์เป็นนิตย์ ข้าพระองค์ทั้งหลายจะกล่าวสรรเสริญพระองค์ตลอดทุกชั่วอายุ
word.spanish1909: Y nosotros, pueblo tuyo, y ovejas de tu dehesa, Te alabaremos para siempre: Por generación y generación cantaremos tus alabanzas.
word.latinvulgate: Ut quid destruxisti maceriam ejus, et vindemiant eam omnes qui prætergrediuntur viam ?
word.italian1927: E noi, tuo popolo e gregge del tuo pasco, ti celebreremo in perpetuo, pubblicheremo la tua lode per ogni età.
word.german1912: Wir aber, dein Volk und Schafe deiner Weide, werden dir danken ewiglich und verkündigen deinen Ruhm für und für.
word.french1910: Et nous, ton peuple, le troupeau de ton pâturage, Nous te célébrerons éternellement; De génération en génération nous publierons tes louanges.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 這樣，我們作你的子民，作你牧場上的羊的，要永遠稱謝你；我們要世世代代述說你可稱頌的事。
word.korean: 그러하면 주의 백성 곧 주의 기르시는 양 된 우리는 영원히 주께 감사하며 주의 영예를 대대로 전하리이다
word.tagalog: Sa gayo'y kaming iyong bayan at mga tupa sa pastulan mo mangagpapasalamat sa iyo magpakailan man: aming ipakikilala ang iyong kapurihan sa lahat ng mga lahi.
word.maori: Penei ka whakawhetai matou, tau iwi, nga hipi hoki e hepara nei koe, ki a koe ake ake: ka whakaitea e matou te whakamoemiti ki a koe, ki nga whakatupuranga katoa.
word.cebuano: Busa kami nga imong katawohan ug mga carnero sa imong sibsibanan Magahatag kanimo sa mga pasalamat sa walay katapusan: Among igapasundayag ang imong mga pagdayeg sa tanang mga kaliwatan.
word.hebrew: יג  ואנחנו עמך וצאן מרעיתך--    נודה לך לעולם לדר ודר--    נספר תהלתך
word.hebrewmodern: ואנחנו עמך וצאן מרעיתך נודה לך לעולם לדר ודר נספר תהלתך׃
word.greekot: ἵνα τί καθεῖλες τὸν φραγμὸν αὐτῆς καὶ τρυγῶσιν αὐτὴν πάντες οἱ παραπορευόμενοι τὴν ὁδόν

word.kjv: I will praise thee, O Lord my God, with all my heart: and I will glorify thy name for evermore.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่องค์พระผู้เป็นเจ้าพระเจ้าของข้าพระองค์ ข้าพระองค์จะสรรเสริญพระองค์ด้วยสิ้นสุดใจ และข้าพระองค์จะเทิดทูนพระนามของพระองค์เป็นนิตย์
word.spanish1909: Te alabaré, oh Jehová Dios mío, con todo mi corazón; Y glorificaré tu nombre para siempre.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Io ti celebrerò, Signore, Iddio mio, con tutto il mio cuore, e glorificherò il tuo nome in perpetuo.
word.german1912: Ich danke dir, HERR, mein Gott, von ganzem Herzen und ehre deinen Namen ewiglich.
word.french1910: Je te louerai de tout mon coeur, Seigneur, mon Dieu! Et je glorifierai ton nom à perpétuité.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 主我的　神啊！我要滿心稱讚你，我要永遠榮耀你的名。
word.korean: 주 나의 하나님이여, 내가 전심으로 주를 찬송하고 영영토록 주의 이름에 영화를 돌리오리니
word.tagalog: Pupurihin kita, Oh Panginoon kong Dios ng aking buong puso; at luluwalhatiin ko ang iyong pangalan magpakailan man.
word.maori: Ka whakamoemiti katoa toku ngakau ki a koe, e te Ariki, e toku Atua: ka whakakororia ano i tou ingoa ake ake.
word.cebuano: Pagadayegon ko ikaw, Oh Ginoo nga Dios ko, uban sa bug-os ko nga kasingkasing; Ug pagahimayaon ko ang imong ngalan sa walay katapusan.
word.hebrew: יב  אודך אדני אלהי--בכל-לבבי    ואכבדה שמך לעולם
word.hebrewmodern: אודך אדני אלהי בכל לבבי ואכבדה שמך לעולם׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Wilt thou shew wonders to the dead? shall the dead arise and praise thee? Selah.
word.thailand: พระองค์จะทรงกระทำการมหัศจรรย์เพื่อคนตายหรือ ชาวแดนผู้ตายจะลุกขึ้นสรรเสริญพระองค์ได้หรือ เซลาห์
word.spanish1909: ¿Harás tú milagro á los muertos? ¿Levantaránse los muertos para alabarte? (Selah.)
word.latinvulgate: Tu dominaris potestati maris, motum autem fluctuum ejus tu mitigas.
word.italian1927: Opererai tu qualche miracolo per i morti? I trapassati risorgeranno essi a celebrarti? Sela.
word.german1912: Wirst du denn unter den Toten Wunder tun, oder werden die Verstorbenen aufstehen und dir danken? (Sela.)
word.french1910: Est-ce pour les morts que tu fais des miracles? Les morts se lèvent-ils pour te louer? Pause.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你要為死人行奇事嗎？陰魂會起來稱謝你嗎？（細拉）
word.korean: 주께서 사망한 자에게 기사를 보이시겠나이까 유혼이 일어나 주를 찬송하리이까 ? (셀라)
word.tagalog: Magpapakita ka ba ng mga kababalaghan sa mga patay? Sila bang mga patay ay magsisibangon, at magsisipuri sa iyo? (Selah)
word.maori: ¶ Tera ranei koe e mahi merekara ki nga tupapaku? E ara koia te hunga kua mate ki te whakamoemiti ki a koe? (Hera.
word.cebuano: Pagabuhaton mo ba ang mga katingalahan sa mga minatay? Mobangon ba sila nga mga nangamatay ug magadayeg kanimo? (Selah
word.hebrew: י  עיני דאבה    מני-עני קראתיך יהוה בכל-יום    שטחתי אליך כפי
word.hebrewmodern: הלמתים תעשה פלא אם רפאים יקומו יודוך סלה׃
word.greekot: σὺ δεσπόζεις τοῦ κράτους τῆς θαλάσσης τὸν δὲ σάλον τῶν κυμάτων αὐτῆς σὺ καταπραΰνεις

word.kjv: And the heavens shall praise thy wonders, O LORD: thy faithfulness also in the congregation of the saints.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ ฟ้าสวรรค์จะสรรเสริญการมหัศจรรย์ของพระองค์ และสรรเสริญความสัตย์สุจริตของพระองค์ในที่ประชุมของบรรดาวิสุทธิชนด้วย
word.spanish1909: Y celebrarán los cielos tu maravilla, oh Jehová; Tu verdad también en la congregación de los santos.
word.latinvulgate: quæ pro nihilo habentur eorum anni erunt.
word.italian1927: Anche i cieli celebrano le tue maraviglie, o Eterno, e la tua fedeltà nell’assemblea dei santi.
word.german1912: Und die Himmel werden, HERR, deine Wunder preisen und deine Wahrheit in der Gemeinde der Heiligen.
word.french1910: Les cieux célèbrent tes merveilles, ô Eternel! Et ta fidélité dans l'assemblée des saints.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華啊！諸天要稱頌你的奇事；在聖者的會中，你的信實也要被稱頌。
word.korean: 여호와여, 주의 기사를 하늘이 찬양할 것이요 주의 성실도 거룩한 자의 회중에서 찬양하리이다
word.tagalog: At pupurihin ng langit ang iyong mga kababalaghan, Oh Panginoon; ang pagtatapat mo naman sa kapulungan ng mga banal.
word.maori: ¶ Ka whakamoemiti ano nga rangi, e Ihowa, ki au mahi whakamiharo; ki tou pono hoki i roto i te whakaminenga o te hunga tapu.
word.cebuano: Ug ang kalangitan magadayeg sa imong mga katingalahan, Oh Jehova; Ang imong pagkamatinumanon usab diha sa katilingban sa mga balaan.
word.hebrew: ה  עד-עולם אכין זרעך    ובניתי לדר-ודור כסאך סלה
word.hebrewmodern: ויודו שמים פלאך יהוה אף אמונתך בקהל קדשים׃
word.greekot: τὰ ἐξουδενώματα αὐτῶν ἔτη ἔσονται τὸ πρωὶ ὡσεὶ χλόη παρέλθοι

word.kjv: It is a good thing to give thanks unto the LORD, and to sing praises unto thy name, O most High:
word.thailand: เป็นการดีที่จะโมทนาพระคุณพระเยโฮวาห์ ข้าแต่องค์ผู้สูงสุด ที่จะร้องเพลงสรรเสริญพระนามของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Salmo: Canción para el día del Sábado. BUENO es alabar á Jehová, Y cantar salmos á tu nombre, oh Altísimo;
word.latinvulgate: Laus cantici ipsi David, in die ante sabbatum, quando fundata est terra. Dominus regnavit, decorem indutus est : indutus est Dominus fortitudinem, et præcinxit se. Etenim firmavit orbem terræ, qui non commovebitur.
word.italian1927: Salmo. Canto per il giorno del sabato. Buona cosa è celebrare l’Eterno, e salmeggiare al tuo nome, o Altissimo;
word.german1912: Ein Psalmlied auf den Sabbattag.  Das ist ein köstlich Ding, dem HERRN danken, und lobsingen deinem Namen, du Höchster,
word.french1910: Psaume. Cantique pour le jour du sabbat. Il est beau de louer l'Eternel, Et de célébrer ton nom, ô Très-Haut!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 詩一首，安息日的歌。稱謝耶和華，歌頌你至高者的名；
word.korean: (안식일의 찬송 시) 지존자여, 십현금과, 비파와, 수금의 정숙한 소리로 여호와께 감사하며 주의 이름을 찬양하며 아침에 주의 인자하심을 나타내며 밤마다 주의 성실하심을 베풂이 좋으니이다
word.tagalog: Isang mabuting bagay ang magpapasalamat sa Panginoon, at umawit ng mga pagpuri sa iyong pangalan, Oh Kataastaasan:
word.maori: ¶ He himene, he waiata mo te ra Hapati. He mea pai te whakawhetai ki a Ihowa, te himene atu ki tou ingoa, e te Runga Rawa:
word.cebuano: Maoy usa ka butang nga maayo ang paghatag ug mga pasalamat kang Jehova, Ug sa pag-awit sa mga pagdayeg sa imong ngalan, Oh Hataas Uyamut;
word.hebrew: א  מזמור שיר ליום השבת
word.hebrewmodern: מזמור שיר ליום השבת טוב להדות ליהוה ולזמר לשמך עליון׃
word.greekot: εἰς τὴν ἡμέραν τοῦ προσαββάτου ὅτε κατῴκισται ἡ γῆ αἶνος ᾠδῆς τῷ δαυιδ ὁ κύριος ἐβασίλευσεν εὐπρέπειαν ἐνεδύσατο ἐνεδύσατο κύριος δύναμιν καὶ περιεζώσατο καὶ γὰρ ἐστερέωσεν τὴν οἰκουμένην ἥτις οὐ σαλευθήσεται

word.kjv: For the LORD is great, and greatly to be praised: he is to be feared above all gods.
word.thailand: เพราะพระเยโฮวาห์นั้นทรงยิ่งใหญ่และสมควรจะสรรเสริญอย่างยิ่ง พระองค์ทรงเป็นที่เกรงกลัวเหนือพระทั้งปวง
word.spanish1909: Porque grande es Jehová, y digno de suprema alabanza; Terrible sobre todos los dioses.
word.latinvulgate: Illuxerunt fulgura ejus orbi terræ ; vidit, et commota est terra.
word.italian1927: Perché l’Eterno è grande e degno di sovrana lode; egli è tremendo sopra tutti gli dèi.
word.german1912: Denn der HERR ist groß und hoch zu loben, wunderbar über alle Götter.
word.french1910: Car l'Eternel est grand et très digne de louange, Il est redoutable par-dessus tous les dieux;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為耶和華是偉大的，該受極大的讚美，他當受敬畏，過於眾神之上。
word.korean: 여호와는 광대하시니 극진히 찬양할 것이요 모든 신보다 경외할 것임이여
word.tagalog: Sapagka't dakila ang Panginoon, at marapat na purihin: siya'y kinatatakutang higit kay sa lahat na dios.
word.maori: He nui hoki a Ihowa, he tika ano kia nui te whakamoemiti ki a ia: kia wehingia nuitia ai i nga atua katoa.
word.cebuano: Kay daku si Jehova, ug takus sa labing daku nga pagdayeg: Siya takus pagakahadlokan ibabaw sa tanang mga dios.
word.hebrew: ד  כי גדול יהוה ומהלל מאד    נורא הוא על-כל-אלהים
word.hebrewmodern: כי גדול יהוה ומהלל מאד נורא הוא על כל אלהים׃
word.greekot: ἔφαναν αἱ ἀστραπαὶ αὐτοῦ τῇ οἰκουμένῃ εἶδεν καὶ ἐσαλεύθη ἡ γῆ

word.kjv: Make a joyful noise unto the LORD, all the earth: make a loud noise, and rejoice, and sing praise.
word.thailand: ชาวโลกทั้งสิ้นเอ๋ย จงเปล่งเสียงชื่นบานถวายแด่พระเยโฮวาห์ เปล่งเป็นเสียงเพลงชื่นบานและร้องเพลงสรรเสริญ
word.spanish1909: Cantad alegres á Jehová, toda la tierra; Levantad la voz, y aplaudid, y salmead.
word.latinvulgate: et honor regis judicium diligit. Tu parasti directiones ; judicium et justitiam in Jacob tu fecisti.
word.italian1927: Acclamate l’Eterno, abitanti di tutta la terra, date in canti di giubilo e salmeggiate,
word.german1912: Jauchzet dem HERRN, alle Welt; singet, rühmet und lobet!
word.french1910: Poussez vers l'Eternel des cris de joie, Vous tous, habitants de la terre! Faites éclater votre allégresse, et chantez!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 全地都要向耶和華歡呼，要發聲歡唱，要歌頌。
word.korean: 온 땅이여, 여호와께 즐거이 소리할지어다 ! 소리를 발하여 즐거이 노래하며 찬송할지어다
word.tagalog: Magkaingay kayo na may kagalakan sa Panginoon, buong lupa. Mangagpasimula at magsiawit dahil sa kagalakan, oo, magsiawit kayo ng mga pagpuri.
word.maori: ¶ Kia hari te hamama, e te whenua katoa, ki a Ihowa: hamama, kia hari, ae ra, himene atu.
word.cebuano: Panaghugyaw kamo sa tingog nga malipayon alang kang Jehova, tibook nga yuta: Ipatugbaw ninyo ang tingog ug panag-awit kamo sa kalipay, oo, panag-awit ug mga pagdayeg.
word.hebrew: ד  הריעו ליהוה כל-הארץ    פצחו ורננו וזמרו
word.hebrewmodern: הריעו ליהוה כל הארץ פצחו ורננו וזמרו׃
word.greekot: καὶ τιμὴ βασιλέως κρίσιν ἀγαπᾷ σὺ ἡτοίμασας εὐθύτητας κρίσιν καὶ δικαιοσύνην ἐν ιακωβ σὺ ἐποίησας

word.kjv: Let them praise thy great and terrible name; for it is holy.
word.thailand: ให้เขาสรรเสริญพระนามอันยิ่งใหญ่และน่าคร้ามกลัวของพระองค์ เพราะพระนามนั้นบริสุทธิ์
word.spanish1909: Alaben tu nombre grande y tremendo: El es santo.
word.latinvulgate: Scitote quoniam Dominus ipse est Deus ; ipse fecit nos, et non ipsi nos ; populus ejus, et oves pascuæ ejus.
word.italian1927: Lodino essi il tuo nome grande e tremendo. Egli è santo.
word.german1912: Man danke deinem großen und wunderbaren Namen, der da heilig ist.
word.french1910: Qu'on célèbre ton nom grand et redoutable! Il est saint!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 願他們稱讚你偉大可畏的名。他是聖潔的。
word.korean: 주의 크고 두려운 이름을 찬송할찌어다 그는 거룩하시도다
word.tagalog: Purihin nila ang iyong dakila at kakilakilabot na pangalan: siya'y banal.
word.maori: Kia whakamoemiti ratou ki tou ingoa nui, whakamataku; he tapu ia.
word.cebuano: Padayega sila sa imong daku ug makalilisang nga ngalan: Balaan man siya.
word.hebrew: ג  יודו שמך גדול ונורא    קדוש הוא
word.hebrewmodern: יודו שמך גדול ונורא קדוש הוא׃
word.greekot: γνῶτε ὅτι κύριος αὐτός ἐστιν ὁ θεός αὐτὸς ἐποίησεν ἡμᾶς καὶ οὐχ ἡμεῖς λαὸς αὐτοῦ καὶ πρόβατα τῆς νομῆς αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: Exalt the LORD our God, and worship at his holy hill; for the LORD our God is holy.
word.thailand: จงยอพระเกียรติพระเยโฮวาห์พระเจ้าของเรา และนมัสการที่ภูเขาอันบริสุทธิ์ของพระองค์ เพราะพระเยโฮวาห์พระเจ้าของเราบริสุทธิ์
word.spanish1909: Ensalzad á Jehová nuestro Dios, Y encorvaos al monte de su santidad; Porque Jehová nuestro Dios es santo.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Esaltate l’Eterno, l’Iddio nostro, e adorate sul monte della sua santità; perché l’Eterno, l’Iddio nostro, è santo.
word.german1912: Erhöhet den HERRN, unsern Gott, und betet an zu seinem heiligen Berge; denn der HERR, unser Gott, ist heilig.
word.french1910: Exaltez l'Eternel, notre Dieu, Et prosternez-vous sur sa montagne sainte! Car il est saint, l'Eternel, notre Dieu!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你們要尊崇耶和華我們的　神，在他的聖山上敬拜，因為耶和華我們的　神是聖潔的。
word.korean: 너희는 여호와 우리 하나님을 높이고 그 성산에서 경배할지어다 대저 여호와 우리 하나님은 거룩하시도다
word.tagalog: Ibunyi ninyo ang Panginoon nating Dios, at magsisamba kayo sa kaniyang banal na bundok; sapagka't ang Panginoon nating Dios ay banal.
word.maori: Whakanuia a Ihowa, to tatou Atua, koropiko atu i tona maunga tapu: he tapu hoki a Ihowa, to tatou Atua.
word.cebuano: Bayawa ninyo si Jehova nga atong Dios, Ug managsimba kamo didto sa bungtod sa iyang pagkabalaan; Kay si Jehova nga atong Dios balaan man.
word.hebrew: ט  רוממו יהוה אלהינו    והשתחוו להר קדשו כי-קדוש    יהוה אלהינו
word.hebrewmodern: רוממו יהוה אלהינו והשתחוו להר קדשו כי קדוש יהוה אלהינו׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Enter into his gates with thanksgiving, and into his courts with praise: be thankful unto him, and bless his name.
word.thailand: จงเข้าประตูของพระองค์ด้วยการโมทนา และเข้าบริเวณพระนิเวศของพระองค์ด้วยการสรรเสริญ จงถวายโมทนาขอบพระคุณพระองค์ จงถวายสาธุการแด่พระนามของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Entrad por sus puertas con reconocimiento, Por sus atrios con alabanza: Alabadle, bendecid su nombre.
word.latinvulgate: cor pravum ; declinantem a me malignum non cognoscebam.
word.italian1927: Entrate nelle sue porte con ringraziamento, e nei suoi cortili con lode; celebratelo, benedite il suo nome.
word.german1912: Geht zu seinen Toren ein mit Danken, zu seinen Vorhöfen mit Loben; danket ihm, lobet seinen Namen!
word.french1910: Entrez dans ses portes avec des louanges, Dans ses parvis avec des cantiques! Célébrez-le, bénissez son nom!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 應當充滿感恩進入他的殿門，滿口讚美進入他的院子；要感謝他，稱頌他的名。
word.korean: 감사함으로 그 문에 들어가며 찬송함으로 그 궁정에 들어가서 그에게 감사하며 그 이름을 송축할지어다
word.tagalog: Magsipasok kayo sa kaniyang mga pintuang-daan na may pagpapasalamat, at sa kaniyang looban na may pagpupuri: mangagpasalamat kayo sa kaniya, at purihin ninyo ang kaniyang pangalan.
word.maori: Tomokia ona tatau i runga i te whakawhetai, ona marae i runga i te whakamoemiti: whakawhetai atu ki a ia, whakapaingia tona ingoa.
word.cebuano: Sumulod kamo ngadto sa iyang mga ganghaan uban ang pasalamat, Ug ngadto sa iyang mga sawang uban ang pagdayeg; Ihatag ang mga pasalamat ngadto kaniya, ug dayegon ninyo ang iyang ngalan.
word.hebrew: ד  באו שעריו בתודה--חצרתיו בתהלה    הודו-לו ברכו שמו
word.hebrewmodern: באו שעריו בתודה חצרתיו בתהלה הודו לו ברכו שמו׃
word.greekot: οὐκ ἐκολλήθη μοι καρδία σκαμβή ἐκκλίνοντος ἀπ' ἐμοῦ τοῦ πονηροῦ οὐκ ἐγίνωσκον

word.kjv: This shall be written for the generation to come: and the people which shall be created shall praise the LORD.
word.thailand: จงบันทึกเรื่องนี้ไว้ให้ชั่วอายุที่จะมีมา เพื่อประชาชนที่ยังจะทรงสร้างมานั้นจะได้สรรเสริญพระเยโฮวาห์
word.spanish1909: Escribirse ha esto para la generación venidera: Y el pueblo que se criará, alabará á JAH.
word.latinvulgate: his qui servant testamentum ejus, et memores sunt mandatorum ipsius ad faciendum ea.
word.italian1927: Questo sarà scritto per l’età a venire, e il popolo che sarà creato loderà l’Eterno,
word.german1912: Das werde geschrieben auf die Nachkommen; und das Volk, das geschaffen soll werden, wird den HERRN loben.
word.french1910: Que cela soit écrit pour la génération future, Et que le peuple qui sera créé célèbre l'Eternel!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 這些事要記下來，傳給後代，好使將來出生的人民可以讚美耶和華。
word.korean: 이 일이 장래 세대를 위하여 기록되리니 창조함을 받을 백성이 여호와를 찬송하리로다
word.tagalog: Ito'y isusulat na ukol sa lahing susunod: at ang bayang lalalangin ay pupuri sa Panginoon.
word.maori: Ka tuhituhia tenei mo to muri whakatupuranga: a ka whakamoemiti ki a Ihowa te iwi meake hanga.
word.cebuano: Kini sulaton alang sa kaliwatan nga umalabut; Ug ang katawohan nga pagabuhaton magadayeg kang Jehova.
word.hebrew: יח  פנה אל-תפלת הערער    ולא-בזה את-תפלתם
word.hebrewmodern: תכתב זאת לדור אחרון ועם נברא יהלל יה׃
word.greekot: τοῖς φυλάσσουσιν τὴν διαθήκην αὐτοῦ καὶ μεμνημένοις τῶν ἐντολῶν αὐτοῦ τοῦ ποιῆσαι αὐτάς

word.kjv: To declare the name of the LORD in Zion, and his praise in Jerusalem;
word.thailand: เพื่อจะประกาศพระนามของพระเยโฮวาห์ในศิโยน และกล่าวสรรเสริญพระองค์ในเยรูซาเล็ม
word.spanish1909: Porque cuenten en Sión el nombre de Jehová, Y su alabanza en Jerusalem,
word.latinvulgate: Benedicite Domino, omnes virtutes ejus, ministri ejus, qui facitis voluntatem ejus.
word.italian1927: affinché pubblichino il nome dell’Eterno in Sion e la sua lode in Gerusalemme,
word.german1912: auf daß sie zu Zion predigen den Namen des HERRN und sein Lob zu Jerusalem,
word.french1910: Afin qu'ils publient dans Sion le nom de l'Eternel, Et ses louanges dans Jérusalem,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 使人在錫安傳揚耶和華的名，在耶路撒冷傳揚讚美他的話。
word.korean: 여호와의 이름을 시온에서 그 영예를 예루살렘에서 선포케 하려 하심이라
word.tagalog: Upang maipahayag ng mga tao ang pangalan ng Panginoon sa Sion, at ang kaniyang kapurihan sa Jerusalem;
word.maori: Kia whakapuakina ai te ingo o Ihowa i Hiona, me te whakamoemiti ki a ia i Hiruharama;
word.cebuano: Aron isugilon sa mga tawo ang ngalan ni Jehova sa Sion, Ug ang iyang pagdayeg didto sa Jerusalem;
word.hebrew: כא  לשמע אנקת אסיר    לפתח בני תמותה
word.hebrewmodern: לספר בציון שם יהוה ותהלתו בירושלם׃
word.greekot: εὐλογεῖτε τὸν κύριον πᾶσαι αἱ δυνάμεις αὐτοῦ λειτουργοὶ αὐτοῦ ποιοῦντες τὸ θέλημα αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: I will sing unto the LORD as long as I live: I will sing praise to my God while I have my being.
word.thailand: ข้ามีชีวิตอยู่ตราบใด ข้าจะร้องเพลงถวายพระเยโฮวาห์ ขณะข้ายังเป็นอยู่ ข้าจะร้องเพลงสรรเสริญพระเจ้าของข้า
word.spanish1909: A Jehová cantaré en mi vida: A mi Dios salmearé mientras viviere.
word.latinvulgate: Et percussit vineas eorum, et ficulneas eorum, et contrivit lignum finium eorum.
word.italian1927: Io canterò all’Eterno finché io viva; salmeggerò al mio Dio finché io esista.
word.german1912: Ich will dem HERRN singen mein Leben lang und meinen Gott loben, solange ich bin.
word.french1910: Je chanterai l'Eternel tant que je vivrai, Je célébrerai mon Dieu tant que j'existerai.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我一生要向耶和華歌唱；我還在世的時候，我要向我的　神歌頌。
word.korean: 나의 묵상을 가상히 여기시기를 바라나니 나는 여호와로 인하여 즐거워하리로다
word.tagalog: Aawit ako sa Panginoon habang ako'y nabubuhay: ako'y aawit ng pagpuri sa aking Dios, samantalang mayroon akong kabuhayan.
word.maori: Ka waiata ahau ki a Ihowa i ahau e ora ana: ka himene ki toku Atua i ahau ano i te ao nei.
word.cebuano: Kang Jehova magaawit ako samtang nga buhi pa ako: Sa akong Dios magaawit ako ug pagdayeg samtang nga buhi pa ako.
word.hebrew: לג  אשירה ליהוה בחיי    אזמרה לאלהי בעודי
word.hebrewmodern: אשירה ליהוה בחיי אזמרה לאלהי בעודי׃
word.greekot: καὶ ἐπάταξεν τὰς ἀμπέλους αὐτῶν καὶ τὰς συκᾶς αὐτῶν καὶ συνέτριψεν πᾶν ξύλον ὁρίου αὐτῶν

word.kjv: Who can utter the mighty acts of the LORD? who can shew forth all his praise?
word.thailand: ผู้ใดจะพรรณนาถึงพระราชกิจอันทรงมหิทธิฤทธิ์ของพระเยโฮวาห์ ผู้ใดจะแสดงถึงพระเกียรติของพระองค์อย่างครบถ้วนได้
word.spanish1909: ¿Quién expresará las valentías de Jehová? ¿Quién contará sus alabanzas?
word.latinvulgate: Dicant qui redempti sunt a Domino, quos redemit de manu inimici, et de regionibus congregavit eos,
word.italian1927: Chi può raccontare le gesta dell’Eterno, o pubblicar tutta la sua lode?
word.german1912: Wer kann die großen Taten des HERRN ausreden und alle seine löblichen Werke preisen?
word.french1910: Qui dira les hauts faits de l'Eternel? Qui publiera toute sa louange?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 誰能述說耶和華大能的作為，誰能說盡讚美他的話？
word.korean: 뉘 능히 여호와의 능하신 사적을 전파하며 그 영예를 다 광포할꼬
word.tagalog: Sinong makapagbabadya ng mga makapangyarihang gawa ng Panginoon, o makapagpapakilala ng buo niyang kapurihan?
word.maori: Me wai e korero nga mahi nunui a Ihowa: e whakakite katoa nga whakamoemiti ki a ia?
word.cebuano: Kinsa ba ang makasaysay sa mga buhat nga gamhanan ni Jehova, O kinsa ba ang makasugilon sa tanan niyang mga pagdayeg?
word.hebrew: ב  מי--ימלל גבורות יהוה    ישמיע כל-תהלתו
word.hebrewmodern: מי ימלל גבורות יהוה ישמיע כל תהלתו׃
word.greekot: εἰπάτωσαν οἱ λελυτρωμένοι ὑπὸ κυρίου οὓς ἐλυτρώσατο ἐκ χειρὸς ἐχθροῦ

word.kjv: Then believed they his words; they sang his praise.
word.thailand: แล้วท่านเชื่อพระวจนะของพระองค์ ท่านร้องเพลงสรรเสริญพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Entonces creyeron á sus palabras, Y cantaron su alabanza.
word.latinvulgate: Et humiliatum est in laboribus cor eorum ; infirmati sunt, nec fuit qui adjuvaret.
word.italian1927: Allora credettero alle sue parole, e cantarono la sua lode.
word.german1912: Da glaubten sie an seine Worte und sangen sein Lob.
word.french1910: Et ils crurent à ses paroles, Ils chantèrent ses louanges.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 那時他們才相信他的話，唱歌讚美他。
word.korean: 이에 저희가 그 말씀을 믿고 그 찬송을 불렀도다
word.tagalog: Nang magkagayo'y sinampalatayanan nila ang kaniyang mga salita; inawit nila ang kaniyang kapurihan.
word.maori: Na whakapono ana ratou ki ana kupu: a waiata ana i te whakamoemiti ki a ia.
word.cebuano: Unya mingtoo sila sa iyang mga pulong; Nanag-awit sila sa iyang pagdayeg.
word.hebrew: יב  ויאמינו בדבריו    ישירו תהלתו
word.hebrewmodern: ויאמינו בדבריו ישירו תהלתו׃
word.greekot: καὶ ἐταπεινώθη ἐν κόποις ἡ καρδία αὐτῶν ἠσθένησαν καὶ οὐκ ἦν ὁ βοηθῶν

word.kjv: Save us, O LORD our God, and gather us from among the heathen, to give thanks unto thy holy name, and to triumph in thy praise.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์พระเจ้าของข้าพระองค์ทั้งหลาย ขอทรงช่วยข้าพระองค์ทั้งหลายให้รอด และขอทรงรวบรวมข้าพระองค์ทั้งหลายจากท่ามกลางประชาชาติต่างๆ เพื่อข้าพระองค์ทั้งหลายจะโมทนาขอบพระคุณพระนามบริสุทธิ์ของพระองค์ และเริงโลดในการสรรเสริญพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Sálvanos, Jehová Dios nuestro, Y júntanos de entre las gentes, Para que loemos tu santo nombre, Para que nos gloriemos en tus alabanzas.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Salvaci, o Eterno, Iddio nostro, e raccoglici di fra le nazioni, affinché celebriamo il tuo santo nome, e mettiamo la nostra gloria nel lodarti.
word.german1912: Hilf uns, HERR, unser Gott, und bringe uns zusammen aus den Heiden, daß wir danken deinem heiligen Namen und rühmen dein Lob.
word.french1910: Sauve-nous, Eternel, notre Dieu! Et rassemble-nous du milieu des nations, Afin que nous célébrions ton saint nom, Et que nous mettions notre gloire à te louer!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華我們的　神啊！求你拯救我們，把我們從萬國中招聚回來，我們好稱謝你的聖名，以讚美你為誇耀。
word.korean: 여호와 우리 하나님이여, 우리를 구원하사 열방 중에서 모으시고 우리로 주의 성호를 감사하며 주의 영예를 찬양하게 하소서
word.tagalog: Iligtas mo kami, Oh Panginoon naming Dios, at pisanin mo kami na mula sa mga bansa, upang mangagpasalamat sa iyong banal na pangalan, at mangagtagumpay sa iyong kapurihan.
word.maori: Whakaorangia matou, e Ihowa, e to matou Atua, kohikohia matou i roto i nga tauiwi: kia whakawhetai ai ki tou ingoa tapu, kia whakamanamana ai ki tou whakamoemiti.
word.cebuano: Luwasa kami, Oh Jehova nga among Dios, Ug tiguma kami gikan sa taliwala sa mga nasud, Aron sa paghatag ug mga pasalamat sa imong ngalan nga balaan, Ug aron sa paghimaya sa imong pagdayeg.
word.hebrew: מז  הושיענו יהוה אלהינו    וקבצנו מן-הגוים להדות לשם קדשך    להשתבח בתהלתך
word.hebrewmodern: הושיענו יהוה אלהינו וקבצנו מן הגוים להדות לשם קדשך להשתבח בתהלתך׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Oh that men would praise the LORD for his goodness, and for his wonderful works to the children of men!
word.thailand: ให้เขาขอบพระคุณพระเยโฮวาห์เพราะความดีของพระองค์ เพราะการมหัศจรรย์ของพระองค์ที่มีต่อบุตรทั้งหลายของมนุษย์
word.spanish1909: Alaben la misericordia de Jehová, Y sus maravillas para con los hijos de los hombres.
word.latinvulgate: Deus locutus est in sancto suo : exsultabo, et dividam Sichimam ; et convallem tabernaculorum dimetiar.
word.italian1927: Celebrino l’Eterno per la sua benignità, e per le sue maraviglie a pro dei figliuoli degli uomini!
word.german1912: die sollen dem HERRN danken für seine Güte und für seine Wunder, die er an den Menschenkindern tut,
word.french1910: Qu'ils louent l'Eternel pour sa bonté, Et pour ses merveilles en faveur des fils de l'homme!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 願人因耶和華的慈愛，和他向世人所行的奇事稱謝他。
word.korean: 여호와의 인자하심과 인생에게 행하신 기이한 일을 인하여 그를 찬송할지로다
word.tagalog: Oh purihin ng mga tao ang Panginoon dahil sa kaniyang kagandahang-loob, at dahil sa kaniyang mga kagilagilalas na mga gawa sa mga anak ng mga tao!
word.maori: Aue! me i whakapaingia e te tangata a Ihowa mo tona atawhai, mo ana mahi whakamiharo ki nga tama a te tangata!
word.cebuano: Oh nga managdayeg unta ang mga tawo kang Jehova tungod sa iyang mahigugmaong-kalolot, Ug tungod sa iyang mga katingalahang buhat alang sa mga anak sa mga tawo!
word.hebrew: ח  יודו ליהוה חסדו    ונפלאותיו לבני אדם
word.hebrewmodern: יודו ליהוה חסדו ונפלאותיו לבני אדם׃
word.greekot: ὁ θεὸς ἐλάλησεν ἐν τῷ ἁγίῳ αὐτοῦ ὑψωθήσομαι καὶ διαμεριῶ σικιμα καὶ τὴν κοιλάδα τῶν σκηνῶν διαμετρήσω

word.kjv: Oh that men would praise the LORD for his goodness, and for his wonderful works to the children of men!
word.thailand: ให้เขาขอบพระคุณพระเยโฮวาห์เพราะความดีของพระองค์ เพราะการมหัศจรรย์ของพระองค์ที่มีต่อบุตรทั้งหลายของมนุษย์
word.spanish1909: Alaben la misericordia de Jehová, Y sus maravillas para con los hijos de los hombres.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Celebrino l’Eterno per la sua benignità, e per le sue maraviglie a pro dei figliuoli degli uomini!
word.german1912: die sollen dem HERRN danken für seine Güte und für seine Wunder, die an den Menschenkindern tut,
word.french1910: Qu'ils louent l'Eternel pour sa bonté, Et pour ses merveilles en faveur des fils de l'homme!

word.maori: Aue! me i whakapaingia e te tangata a Ihowa mo tona atawhai, mo ana mahi whakamiharo ki nga tama a te tangata!
word.cebuano: Oh nga managdayeg unta ang mga tawo kang Jehova, tungod sa iyang mahigugmaong-kalolot, Ug tungod sa iyang mga katingalahang buhat alang sa mga anak sa mga tawo!

word.thailand: ให้เขาขอบพระคุณพระเยโฮวาห์เพราะความดีของพระองค์ เพราะการมหัศจรรย์ของพระองค์ที่มีต่อบุตรทั้งหลายของมนุษย์

word.tagalog: Oh purihin ng mga tao ang Panginoon dahil sa kaniyang kagandahang-loob, at dahil sa kaniyang kagilagilalas na mga gawa sa mga anak ng mga tao!
word.maori: Aue! me i whakapaingia e te tangata a Ihowa mo tona atawhai, mo ana mahi whakamiharo ki nga tama a te tangata!
