word.hebrew: לא  יודו ליהוה חסדו    ונפלאותיו לבני אדם
word.hebrewmodern: יודו ליהוה חסדו ונפלאותיו לבני אדם׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Let them exalt him also in the congregation of the people, and praise him in the assembly of the elders.
word.thailand: ให้เขายอพระเกียรติพระองค์ในชุมนุมประชาชน และสรรเสริญพระองค์ในที่ประชุมของผู้อาวุโส
word.spanish1909: Y ensálcenlo en la congregación del pueblo; Y en consistorio de ancianos lo alaben.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Lo esaltino nell’assemblea del popolo, e lo lodino nel consiglio degli anziani!
word.german1912: und ihn bei der Gemeinde preisen und bei den Alten rühmen. {~}
word.french1910: Qu'ils l'exaltent dans l'assemblée du peuple, Et qu'ils le célèbrent dans la réunion des anciens!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 願他們在眾民的會中尊崇他，在長老的集會中讚美他。
word.korean: 백성의 회에서 저를 높이며 장로들의 자리에서 저를 찬송할지로다
word.tagalog: Ibunyi rin naman nila siya sa kapulungan ng bayan, at purihin siya sa upuan ng mga matanda.
word.maori: Kia whakanui hoki ratou i a ia i roto i te whakaminenga o te iwi; kia whakamoemiti ki a ia i roto i te nohoanga kaumatua.
word.cebuano: Ipabayaw usab kanila siya diha sa katilingban sa katawohan, Ug dayegon siya diha sa lingkoranan sa mga anciano.
word.hebrew: לב  וירוממוהו בקהל-עם    ובמושב זקנים יהללוהו
word.hebrewmodern: וירממוהו בקהל עם ובמושב זקנים יהללוהו׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: O God, my heart is fixed; I will sing and give praise, even with my glory.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเจ้า จิตใจของข้าพระองค์มั่นคง ข้าพระองค์จะร้องเพลงและร้องเพลงสรรเสริญด้วยจิตใจของข้าพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Canción: Salmo de David. MI corazón está dispuesto, oh Dios; Cantaré y salmearé todavía en mi gloria.
word.latinvulgate: In finem. Psalmus David.
word.italian1927: Canto. Salmo di Davide. Il mio cuore è ben disposto, o Dio, io canterò e salmeggerò, e la mia gloria pure.
word.german1912: Ein Psalmlied Davids.  Gott, es ist mein rechter Ernst; ich will singen und dichten, meine Ehre auch.
word.french1910: Cantique. Psaume de David. Mon coeur est affermi, ô Dieu! Je chanterai, je ferai retentir mes instruments: c'est ma gloire!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 歌一首，大衛的詩。　神啊！我的心堅定；我要用我的靈（“靈”或譯：“榮耀”或“肝”；與16:9，30:12，57:8同）歌唱和頌讚。
word.korean: (다윗의 찬송 시) 하나님이여, 내 마음을 정하였사오니 내가 노래하며 내 심령으로 찬양하리로다
word.tagalog: Ang aking puso'y matatag, Oh Dios; ako'y aawit, oo, ako'y aawit ng mga pagpuri, ng aking kaluwalhatian.
word.maori: ¶ He waiata, he himene na Rawiri. Pumau tonu toku ngakau, e te Atua; ka waiata ahau, ae ra, ka himene ahau, me toku kororia ano.
word.cebuano: Ang akong kasingkasing naandam na, Oh Dios; Magaawit ako, oo, magaawit ako ug mga pagdayeg, bisan uban sa akong himaya.
word.hebrew: א-ב  שיר מזמור לדוד
word.hebrewmodern: שיר מזמור לדוד נכון לבי אלהים אשירה ואזמרה אף כבודי׃
word.greekot: εἰς τὸ τέλος τῷ δαυιδ ψαλμός ὁ θεός τὴν αἴνεσίν μου μὴ παρασιωπήσῃς

word.kjv: I will praise thee, O LORD, among the people: and I will sing praises unto thee among the nations.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ ข้าพระองค์จะสรรเสริญพระองค์ท่ามกลางประชาชาติ ข้าพระองค์จะร้องเพลงสรรเสริญพระองค์ท่ามกลางชนชาติทั้งหลาย
word.spanish1909: Te alabaré, oh Jehová, entre los pueblos; A ti cantaré salmos entre las naciones.
word.latinvulgate: Locuti sunt adversum me lingua dolosa, et sermonibus odii circumdederunt me, et expugnaverunt me gratis.
word.italian1927: Io ti celebrerò fra i popoli, o Eterno, e a te salmeggerò fra le nazioni.
word.german1912: Ich will dir danken, HERR, unter den Völkern; ich will dir lobsingen unter den Leuten.
word.french1910: Je te louerai parmi les peuples, Eternel! Je te chanterai parmi les nations.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華啊！我要在萬民中稱謝你，在萬族中歌頌你。
word.korean: 여호와여, 내가 만민 중에서 주께 감사하고 열방 중에서 주를 찬양하오리니
word.tagalog: Ako'y magpapasalamat sa iyo, Oh Panginoon, sa gitna ng mga bayan: at ako'y aawit ng mga pagpuri sa iyo sa gitna ng mga bansa.
word.maori: Ka whakamoemiti ahau ki a koe, e Ihowa, i waenganui i nga iwi: ka himene ki a koe i waenganui i nga tauiwi.
word.cebuano: Magahatag ako kanimo ug mga pasalamat, Oh Jehova, sa taliwala sa mga katawohan; Ug kanimo magaawit ako sa mga pagdayeg sa taliwala sa mga nasud.
word.hebrew: ג  עורה הנבל וכנור    אעירה שחר
word.hebrewmodern: אודך בעמים יהוה ואזמרך בל אמים׃
word.greekot: καὶ λόγοις μίσους ἐκύκλωσάν με καὶ ἐπολέμησάν με δωρεάν

word.kjv: Hold not thy peace, O God of my praise;
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเจ้า ผู้ซึ่งข้าพระองค์สรรเสริญ ขออย่าทรงนิ่งเสีย
word.spanish1909: Al Músico principal: Salmo de David. OH Dios de mi alabanza, no calles;
word.latinvulgate: Psalmus David. Dixit Dominus Domino meo : Sede a dextris meis, donec ponam inimicos tuos scabellum pedum tuorum.
word.italian1927: Per il Capo de’ musici. Salmo di Davide. O Dio della mia lode, non tacere,
word.german1912: Ein Psalm Davids, vorzusingen. Gott, mein Ruhm, schweige nicht!
word.french1910: Au chef des chantres. De David. Psaume. Dieu de ma louange, ne te tais point!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 大衛的詩，交給詩班長。我所讚美的　神啊！求你不要緘默無聲，（本節在《馬索拉抄本》包括細字標題）
word.korean: (다윗의 시. 영장으로 한 노래) 나의 찬송하는 하나님이여, 잠잠하지 마옵소서
word.tagalog: Huwag kang mapayapa, Oh Dios na aking kapurihan;
word.maori: ¶ Ki te tino kaiwhakatangi. He himene na Rawiri. E te Atua, e whakamoemiti nei ahau, kei wahangu koe:
word.cebuano: Ayaw pagpakahilum, Oh Dios, sa akong pagdayeg;
word.hebrew: א  למנצח לדוד מזמור אלהי תהלתי    אל-תחרש
word.hebrewmodern: למנצח לדוד מזמור אלהי תהלתי אל תחרש׃
word.greekot: τῷ δαυιδ ψαλμός εἶπεν ὁ κύριος τῷ κυρίῳ μου κάθου ἐκ δεξιῶν μου ἕως ἂν θῶ τοὺς ἐχθρούς σου ὑποπόδιον τῶν ποδῶν σου

word.kjv: I will greatly praise the LORD with my mouth; yea, I will praise him among the multitude.
word.thailand: ด้วยปากของข้าพเจ้า ข้าพเจ้าจะสรรเสริญพระเยโฮวาห์เป็นอย่างมาก ข้าพเจ้าจะสรรเสริญพระองค์ท่ามกลางคนมากหลาย
word.spanish1909: Yo alabaré á Jehová en gran manera con mi boca, Y le loaré en medio de muchos.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Io celebrerò altamente l’Eterno con la mia bocca, lo loderò in mezzo alla moltitudine;
word.german1912: Ich will dem HERRN sehr danken mit meinem Munde und ihn rühmen unter vielen.
word.french1910: Je louerai de ma bouche hautement l'Eternel, Je le célébrerai au milieu de la multitude;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我要用口極力稱謝耶和華；我要在眾人中間讚美他。
word.korean: 내가 입으로 여호와께 크게 감사하며 무리 중에서 찬송하리니
word.tagalog: Ako'y magpapasalamat ng marami ng aking bibig sa Panginoon; Oo, aking pupurihin siya sa gitna ng karamihan.
word.maori: Ka tino whakawhetai toku mangai ki a Ihowa, ae ra, ka whakamoemiti ahau ki a ia i waenganui o te mano.
word.cebuano: Magahatag ako ug dagkung mga pasalamat ngadto kang Jehova pinaagi sa akong baba; Oo, pagadayegon ko siya sa taliwala sa panon sa katawohan.
word.hebrew: ל  אודה יהוה מאד בפי    ובתוך רבים אהללנו
word.hebrewmodern: אודה יהוה מאד בפי ובתוך רבים אהללנו׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Praise ye the LORD. I will praise the LORD with my whole heart, in the assembly of the upright, and in the congregation.
word.thailand: จงสรรเสริญพระเยโฮวาห์เถิด ข้าพเจ้าจะสรรเสริญพระเยโฮวาห์ด้วยสิ้นสุดใจของข้าพเจ้า ในคณะผู้เที่ยงธรรม ในชุมนุมชน
word.spanish1909: Aleluya. ALABARÉ á Jehová con todo el corazón, En la compañía y congregación de los rectos.
word.latinvulgate: Alleluja, reversionis Aggæi et Zachariæ. Beatus vir qui timet Dominum, in mandatis ejus volet nimis.
word.italian1927: Alleluia. Io celebrerò l’Eterno con tutto il cuore nel consiglio degli uomini diritti, e nell’assemblea.
word.german1912: Halleluja! Ich danke dem HERRN von ganzem Herzen im Rat der Frommen und in der Gemeinde.
word.french1910: Louez l'Eternel! Je louerai l'Eternel de tout mon coeur, Dans la réunion des hommes droits et dans l'assemblée.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 頌讚　神的作為和信實你們要讚美耶和華。在正直人的議會中和大會裡，我要全心稱謝耶和華。
word.korean: 할렐루야 ! 내가 정직한 자의 회와 공회 중에서 전심으로 여호와께 감사하리로다
word.tagalog: Purihin ninyo ang Panginoon. Ako'y magpapasalamat sa Panginoon ng aking buong puso, sa kapulungan ng matuwid, at sa kapisanan.
word.maori: ¶ Whakamoemititia a Ihowa. Ka whakapaua toku ngakau ki te whakawhetai ki a Ihowa, i te runanga o te hunga tika, i te whakaminenga.
word.cebuano: Dayegon ninyo si Jehova. Magapasalamat ako kang Jehova sa bug-os ko nga kasingkasing, Diha sa pagkatigum sa mga tawong matul-id ug sa katilingban.
word.hebrew: א  הללו-יה אודה יהוה בכל-לבב    בסוד ישרים ועדה
word.hebrewmodern: הללו יה אודה יהוה בכל לבב בסוד ישרים ועדה׃
word.greekot: αλληλουια μακάριος ἀνὴρ ὁ φοβούμενος τὸν κύριον ἐν ταῖς ἐντολαῖς αὐτοῦ θελήσει σφόδρα

word.kjv: The fear of the LORD is the beginning of wisdom: a good understanding have all they that do his commandments: his praise endureth for ever.
word.thailand: ความยำเกรงพระเยโฮวาห์เป็นที่เริ่มต้นของสติปัญญา บรรดาผู้ที่ปฏิบัติตามพระบัญญัติของพระองค์ก็ได้ความเข้าใจดี การสรรเสริญพระเจ้าดำรงอยู่เป็นนิตย์
word.spanish1909: El principio de la sabiduría es el temor de Jehová: Buen entendimiento tienen cuantos ponen aquéllos por obra: Su loor permanece para siempre.
word.latinvulgate: Peccator videbit, et irascetur, dentibus suis fremet et tabescet ; desiderium peccatorum peribit.
word.italian1927: Il timor dell’Eterno è il principio della sapienza; buon senno hanno tutti quelli che mettono in pratica la sua legge. La sua lode dimora in perpetuo.
word.german1912: Die Furcht des HERRN ist der Weisheit Anfang. Das ist eine feine Klugheit, wer darnach tut, des Lob bleibt ewiglich.
word.french1910: La crainte de l'Eternel est le commencement de la sagesse; Tous ceux qui l'observent ont une raison saine. Sa gloire subsiste à jamais.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 敬畏耶和華是智慧的開端；凡是這樣行的都是明智的。耶和華該受讚美，直到永遠。
word.korean: 여호와를 경외함이 곧 지혜의 근본이라 그 계명을 지키는 자는 다 좋은 지각이 있나니 여호와를 찬송함이 영원히 있으리로다
word.tagalog: Ang pagkatakot sa Panginoon ay pasimula ng karunungan; may mabuting pagkaunawa ang lahat na nagsisisunod ng kaniyang mga utos. Ang kaniyang kapurihan ay nananatili magpakailan man.
word.maori: Ko te timatanga o te whakaaro nui he wehi ki a Ihowa: he ngarahu nui to te hunga katoa nana era mahi; mau te whakamoemiti ki a ia, ake ake.
word.cebuano: Ang pagkahadlok kang Jehova mao ang sinugdanan sa kaalam; Ang tanan nga nanagtuman sa iyang mga sugo adunay maayong salabutan: Ang iyang pagdayeg nagapadayon sa walay katapusan.
word.hebrew: י  ראשית חכמה יראת יהוה--    שכל טוב לכל-עשיהם תהלתו    עמדת לעד
word.hebrewmodern: ראשית חכמה יראת יהוה שכל טוב לכל עשיהם תהלתו עמדת לעד׃
word.greekot: ἁμαρτωλὸς ὄψεται καὶ ὀργισθήσεται τοὺς ὀδόντας αὐτοῦ βρύξει καὶ τακήσεται ἐπιθυμία ἁμαρτωλῶν ἀπολεῖται

word.kjv: Praise ye the LORD. Praise, O ye servants of the LORD, praise the name of the LORD.
word.thailand: จงสรรเสริญพระเยโฮวาห์เถิด บรรดาผู้รับใช้ของพระเยโฮวาห์เอ๋ย จงสรรเสริญเถิด จงสรรเสริญพระนามพระเยโฮวาห์
word.spanish1909: Aleluya. ALABAD, siervos de Jehová, Alabad el nombre de Jehová.
word.latinvulgate: Alleluja. In exitu Israël de Ægypto, domus Jacob de populo barbaro,
word.italian1927: Alleluia. Lodate, o servi dell’Eterno, lodate il nome dell’Eterno!
word.german1912: Halleluja! Lobet, ihr Knechte des HERRN, lobet den Namen des HERRN!
word.french1910: Louez l'Eternel! Serviteurs de l'Eternel, louez, Louez le nom de l'Eternel!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 頌讚至高的　神垂顧貧寒人你們要讚美耶和華。耶和華的僕人哪！你們要讚美，要讚美耶和華的名。
word.korean: 할렐루야! 여호와의 종들아 찬양하라 ! 여호와의 이름을 찬양하라
word.tagalog: Purihin ninyo ang Panginoon. Purihin ninyo, Oh ninyong mga lingkod ng Panginoon, purihin ninyo ang pangalan ng Panginoon.
word.maori: ¶ Whakamoemititia a Ihowa. Whakamoemititia, e nga pononga a Ihowa, whakamoemititia te ingoa o Ihowa.
word.cebuano: Dayegon ninyo si Jehova. Dayegon ninyo, Oh kamong mga alagad ni Jehova, Dayega ang ngalan ni Jehova
word.hebrew: א  הללו-יה הללו עבדי יהוה    הללו את-שם יהוה
word.hebrewmodern: הללו יה הללו עבדי יהוה הללו את שם יהוה׃
word.greekot: αλληλουια ἐν ἐξόδῳ ισραηλ ἐξ αἰγύπτου οἴκου ιακωβ ἐκ λαοῦ βαρβάρου

word.kjv: From the rising of the sun unto the going down of the same the LORD's name is to be praised.
word.thailand: ตั้งแต่ที่ดวงอาทิตย์ขึ้นจนถึงที่ดวงอาทิตย์ตกพระนามของพระเยโฮวาห์เป็นที่สรรเสริญ
word.spanish1909: Desde el nacimiento del sol hasta donde se pone, Sea alabado el nombre de Jehová.
word.latinvulgate: Mare vidit, et fugit ; Jordanis conversus est retrorsum.
word.italian1927: Dal sol levante fino al ponente sia lodato il nome dell’Eterno!
word.german1912: Vom Aufgang der Sonne bis zu ihrem Niedergang sei gelobet der Name des HERRN!
word.french1910: Du lever du soleil jusqu'à son couchant, Que le nom de l'Eternel soit célébré!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 從日出之地到日落之處，耶和華的名都該受讚美。
word.korean: 해 돋는 데서부터 해 지는 데까지 여호와의 이름이 찬양을 받으시리로다
word.tagalog: Mula sa pagsikat ng araw hanggang sa paglubog niyaon ang pangalan ng Panginoon ay pupurihin,
word.maori: Kia whakamoemititia te ingoa o Ihowa i te putanga mai o te ra, a tae noa ki tona torengitanga.
word.cebuano: Gikan sa pagsilang sa adlaw ngadto sa pagsalop niini Pagadayegon ang ngalan ni Jehova.
word.hebrew: ג  ממזרח-שמש עד-מבואו--    מהלל שם יהוה
word.hebrewmodern: ממזרח שמש עד מבואו מהלל שם יהוה׃
word.greekot: ἡ θάλασσα εἶδεν καὶ ἔφυγεν ὁ ιορδάνης ἐστράφη εἰς τὰ ὀπίσω

word.kjv: The dead praise not the LORD, neither any that go down into silence.
word.thailand: คนตายไม่สรรเสริญพระเยโฮวาห์ หรือผู้ที่ลงไปสู่ที่สงัดก็เช่นนั้น
word.spanish1909: No alabarán los muertos á JAH, Ni cuantos descienden al silencio;
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Non sono i morti che lodano l’Eterno, né alcuno di quelli che scendono nel luogo del silenzio;
word.german1912: Die Toten werden dich, HERR, nicht loben, noch die hinunterfahren in die Stille;
word.french1910: Ce ne sont pas les morts qui célèbrent l'Eternel, Ce n'est aucun de ceux qui descendent dans le lieu du silence;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 死人不能讚美耶和華，下到陰間的不能讚美他。
word.korean: 죽은 자가 여호와를 찬양하지 못하나니 적막한 데 내려가는 아무도 못하리로다
word.tagalog: Ang patay ay hindi pumupuri sa Panginoon, ni sinomang nabababa sa katahimikan;
word.maori: E kore nga tupapaku e whakamoemiti ki a Ihowa: me te hunga katoa ano e heke ana ki te wahangutanga.
word.cebuano: Ang mga minatay dili magadayeg kang Jehova, Ni may mausa niadtong mga nanganaug ngadto sa hilum;
word.hebrew: יז  לא המתים יהללו-יה    ולא כל-ירדי דומה
word.hebrewmodern: לא המתים יהללו יה ולא כל ירדי דומה׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: O praise the LORD, all ye nations: praise him, all ye people.
word.thailand: ประชาชาติทั้งปวงเอ๋ย จงสรรเสริญพระเยโฮวาห์เถิด ชนชาติทั้งหลายเอ๋ย จงยกย่องพระองค์เถิด
word.spanish1909: ALABAD á Jehová, naciones todas; Pueblos todos, alabadle.
word.latinvulgate: Alleluja. Confitemini Domino, quoniam bonus, quoniam in sæculum misericordia ejus.
word.italian1927: Lodate l’Eterno, voi nazioni tutte! Celebratelo, voi tutti i popoli!
word.german1912: Lobet den HERRN, alle Heiden; preiset ihn, alle Völker!
word.french1910: Louez l'Eternel, vous toutes les nations, Célébrez-le, vous tous les peuples!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 呼籲萬民讚美　神萬國啊！你們要讚美耶和華；萬民哪！你們要頌讚他。
word.korean: 너희 모든 나라들아 여호아를 찬양하며 너희 모든 백성들아 저를 칭송할지어다
word.tagalog: Oh purihin ninyo ang Panginoon, ninyong lahat na mga bansa: purihin ninyo siya, ninyong lahat na mga bayan.
word.maori: ¶ Whakamoemititia a Ihowa, e nga tauiwi katoa: whakamoemititia ia, e nga iwi katoa.
word.cebuano: Oh panagdayeg kamo kang Jehova, ngatanan kamo nga mga nasud; Mga katawohan nga tanan, panagdayeg kamo kaniya.
word.hebrew: א  הללו את-יהוה כל-גוים    שבחוהו כל-האמים
word.hebrewmodern: הללו את יהוה כל גוים שבחוהו כל האמים׃
word.greekot: αλληλουια ἐξομολογεῖσθε τῷ κυρίῳ ὅτι ἀγαθός ὅτι εἰς τὸν αἰῶνα τὸ ἔλεος αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: Open to me the gates of righteousness: I will go into them, and I will praise the LORD:
word.thailand: ขอเปิดประตูความชอบธรรมให้ข้าพเจ้า ข้าพเจ้าจะเข้าประตูนั้นไปและจะสรรเสริญพระเยโฮวาห์
word.spanish1909: Abridme las puertas de la justicia: Entraré por ellas, alabaré á JAH.
word.latinvulgate: Incola ego sum in terra, non abscondas a me mandata tua.
word.italian1927: Apritemi le porte della giustizia; io entrerò per esse, e celebrerò l’Eterno.
word.german1912: Tut mir auf die Tore der Gerechtigkeit, daß ich dahin eingehe und dem HERRN danke.
word.french1910: Ouvrez-moi les portes de la justice: J'entrerai, je louerai l'Eternel.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 請你們為我打開正義的門，我要進去，稱謝耶和華。
word.tagalog: Buksan ninyo sa akin ang mga pintuan ng katuwiran; aking papasukan, ako'y magpapasalamat sa Panginoon.
word.maori: ¶ Whakatuwheratia ki ahau nga kuwaha o te tika: ka tomo ahau ki roto, ka whakamoemiti ki a Ihowa.
word.cebuano: Buksi kanako ang mga ganghaan sa pagkamatarung: Mosulod ako kanila, magapasalamat ako kang Jehova.
word.hebrew: יט  פתחו-לי שערי-צדק    אבא-בם אודה יה
word.hebrewmodern: פתחו לי שערי צדק אבא בם אודה יה׃
word.greekot: πάροικος ἐγώ εἰμι ἐν τῇ γῇ μὴ ἀποκρύψῃς ἀπ' ἐμοῦ τὰς ἐντολάς σου

word.kjv: I will praise thee: for thou hast heard me, and art become my salvation.
word.thailand: ข้าพระองค์จะสรรเสริญพระองค์ เพราะพระองค์ทรงฟังข้าพระองค์ และมาเป็นความรอดของข้าพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Te alabaré porque me has oído, Y me fuiste por salud.
word.latinvulgate: Increpasti superbos ; maledicti qui declinant a mandatis tuis.
word.italian1927: Io ti celebrerò perché tu m’hai risposto, e sei stato la mia salvezza.
word.german1912: Ich danke dir, daß du mich demütigst und hilfst mir.
word.french1910: Je te loue, parce que tu m'as exaucé, Parce que tu m'as sauvé.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我要稱謝你，因為你應允了我，又成了我的拯救。
word.tagalog: Ako'y magpapasalamat sa iyo, sapagka't sinagot mo ako! At ikaw ay naging aking kaligtasan.
word.maori: Ka whakamoemiti ahau ki a koe, mou i whakahoki kupu mai ki ahau, kua meinga hoki ko koe hei whakaora moku.
word.cebuano: Pagapasalamatan ko ikaw; kay gipatalinghugan mo ako, Ug ikaw nahimong akong kaluwasan.
word.hebrew: כא  אודך כי עניתני    ותהי-לי לישועה
word.hebrewmodern: אודך כי עניתני ותהי לי לישועה׃
word.greekot: ἐπετίμησας ὑπερηφάνοις ἐπικατάρατοι οἱ ἐκκλίνοντες ἀπὸ τῶν ἐντολῶν σου

word.kjv: Thou art my God, and I will praise thee: thou art my God, I will exalt thee.
word.thailand: พระองค์ทรงเป็นพระเจ้าของข้าพระองค์ และข้าพระองค์จะสรรเสริญพระองค์ พระองค์ทรงเป็นพระเจ้าของข้าพระองค์ ข้าพระองค์จะเชิดชูพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Mi Dios eres tú, y á ti alabaré: Dios mío, á ti ensalzaré.
word.latinvulgate: Dormitavit anima mea præ tædio ; confirma me in verbis tuis.
word.italian1927: Tu sei il mio Dio, io ti celebrerò; tu sei il mio Dio, io ti esalterò.
word.german1912: Du bist mein Gott, und ich danke dir; mein Gott, ich will dich preisen.
word.french1910: Tu es mon Dieu, et je te louerai; Mon Dieu! je t'exalterai.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你是我的　神，我要稱謝你；你是我的　神，我要尊崇你。
word.tagalog: Ikaw ay aking Dios, at magpapasalamat ako sa iyo: ikaw ay aking Dios, aking ibubunyi ka.
word.maori: Ko koe toku Atua, maku koe e whakamoemiti: toku Atua, maku koe e whakanui.
word.cebuano: Ikaw mao ang akong Dios, ug kanimo magapasalamat ako: Ikaw mao ang akong Dios, igapahitaas ko ikaw.
word.hebrew: כח  אלי אתה ואודך    אלהי ארוממך
word.hebrewmodern: אלי אתה ואודך אלהי ארוממך׃
word.greekot: ἔσταξεν ἡ ψυχή μου ἀπὸ ἀκηδίας βεβαίωσόν με ἐν τοῖς λόγοις σου

word.kjv: I will praise thee with uprightness of heart, when I shall have learned thy righteous judgments.
word.thailand: ข้าพระองค์จะสรรเสริญพระองค์ด้วยใจเที่ยงตรง เมื่อข้าพระองค์เรียนรู้คำตัดสินอันชอบธรรมของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Te alabaré con rectitud de corazón, Cuando aprendiere los juicios de tu justicia.
word.latinvulgate: Cum his qui oderunt pacem eram pacificus ; cum loquebar illis, impugnabant me gratis.
word.italian1927: Io ti celebrerò con dirittura di cuore, quando avrò imparato i tuoi giusti decreti.
word.german1912: Ich danke dir von Herzen, daß du mich lehrst die Rechte deiner Gerechtigkeit.
word.french1910: Je te louerai dans la droiture de mon coeur, En apprenant les lois de ta justice.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我學會了你公義的法則，就以正直的心稱謝你。
word.korean: 내가 주의 의로운 판단을 배울 때에는 정직한 마음으로 주께 감사하리이다
word.tagalog: Ako'y magpapasalamat sa iyo sa pamamagitan ng katuwiran ng puso, pagka aking natutuhan ang mga matuwid mong kahatulan.
word.maori: ¶ Ka whakamoemiti ahau ki a koe i runga i te ngakau tika, ina ako ahau i au whakaritenga tika.
word.cebuano: Magapasalamat ako kanimo uban sa katul-id sa kasingkasing, Sa pagkakat-on ko sa imong mga matarung nga paghukom.
word.hebrew: ז  אודך בישר לבב--    בלמדי משפטי צדקך
word.hebrewmodern: אודך בישר לבב בלמדי משפטי צדקך׃
word.greekot: μετὰ τῶν μισούντων τὴν εἰρήνην ἤμην εἰρηνικός ὅταν ἐλάλουν αὐτοῖς ἐπολέμουν με δωρεάν

word.kjv: Seven times a day do I praise thee because of thy righteous judgments.
word.thailand: ข้าพระองค์สรรเสริญพระองค์วันละเจ็ดครั้ง เหตุเรื่องข้อตัดสินอันชอบธรรมของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Siete veces al día te alabo Sobre los juicios de tu justicia.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Io ti lodo sette volte al giorno per i giudizi della tua giustizia.
word.german1912: Ich lobe dich des Tages siebenmal um der Rechte willen deiner Gerechtigkeit.
word.french1910: Sept fois le jour je te célèbre, A cause des lois de ta justice.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我因你公義的典章，一天七次讚美你。
word.korean: 저희가 나를 세상에서 거의 멸하였으나 나는 주의 법도를 버리지 아니하였사오니
word.tagalog: Makapito sa isang araw na pumupuri ako sa iyo, dahil sa iyong matutuwid na kahatulan.
word.maori: ¶ Takiwhitu aku whakamoemiti ki a koe i te ra tahi mo au whakaritenga tika.
word.cebuano: Makapito sa usa ka adlaw ginadayeg ko ikaw, Tungod sa imong matarung mga tulomanon.
word.hebrew: קסד  שבע ביום הללתיך--    על משפטי צדקך
word.hebrewmodern: שבע ביום הללתיך על משפטי צדקך׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: My lips shall utter praise, when thou hast taught me thy statutes.
word.thailand: ริมฝีปากของข้าพระองค์จะเทคำสรรเสริญออกมา ที่พระองค์ทรงสอนกฎเกณฑ์ของพระองค์แก่ข้าพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Mis labios rebosarán alabanza, Cuando me enseñares tus estatutos.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Le mie labbra esprimeranno la tua lode, perché tu m’insegni i tuoi statuti.
word.german1912: Meine Lippen sollen loben, wenn du mich deine Rechte lehrest.
word.french1910: Que mes lèvres publient ta louange! Car tu m'enseignes tes statuts.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 願我的嘴唇湧出讚美的話，因為你把你的律例教導了我。
word.korean: 나는 주의 것이오니 나를 구원하소서 내가 주의 법도를 찾았나이다
word.tagalog: Tulutang magbadya ng pagpuri ang aking mga labi; sapagka't itinuturo mo sa akin ang iyong mga palatuntunan.
word.maori: ¶ Kia whakapuaki oku ngutu i te whakamoemiti: e whakaako ana hoki koe i ahau ki au tikanga.
word.cebuano: Ipapamulong sa akong mga ngabil ang pagdayeg; Kay ikaw nagatudlo kanako sa imong kabalaoran.
word.hebrew: קעא  תבענה שפתי תהלה    כי תלמדני חקיך
word.hebrewmodern: תבענה שפתי תהלה כי תלמדני חקיך׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Let my soul live, and it shall praise thee; and let thy judgments help me.
word.thailand: ขอทรงโปรดให้จิตใจข้าพระองค์มีชีวิตอยู่ และจิตใจนั้นจะสรรเสริญพระองค์ และให้คำตัดสินของพระองค์ช่วยข้าพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Viva mi alma y alábete; Y tus juicios me ayuden.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: L’anima mia viva, ed essa ti loderà; e mi soccorrano i tuoi giudizi.
word.german1912: Laß meine Seele leben, daß sie dich lobe, und deine Rechte mir helfen.
word.french1910: Que mon âme vive et qu'elle te loue! Et que tes jugements me soutiennent!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 求你容我活著，可以讚美你；願你的典章幫助我。
word.korean: 주의 계명이 항상 나와 함께 하므로 그것이 나로 원수보다 지혜롭게 하나이다
word.tagalog: Mabuhay nawa ang aking kaluluwa, at pupuri sa iyo; at tulungan nawa ako ng iyong mga kahatulan.
word.maori: ¶ Kia ora toku wairua, a ka whakamoemiti ia ki a koe: kia awhinatia hoki ahau e au whakaritenga.
word.cebuano: Buhion mo ang akong kalag, ug kini magadayeg kanimo; Ug patabangi ako sa imong mga tulomanon.
word.hebrew: קעה  תחי-נפשי ותהללך    ומשפטך יעזרני
word.hebrewmodern: תחי נפשי ותהללך ומשפטך יעזרני׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Praise ye the LORD. Praise ye the name of the LORD; praise him, O ye servants of the LORD.
word.thailand: จงสรรเสริญพระเยโฮวาห์เถิด จงสรรเสริญพระนามของพระเยโฮวาห์ บรรดาผู้รับใช้ของพระเยโฮวาห์เอ๋ย จงสรรเสริญพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Aleluya. ALABAD el nombre de Jehová; Alabad le, siervos de Jehová;
word.latinvulgate: Alleluja. Confitemini Domino, quoniam bonus, quoniam in æternum misericordia ejus.
word.italian1927: Alleluia. Lodate il nome dell’Eterno. Lodatelo, o servi dell’Eterno,
word.german1912: Halleluja! Lobet den Namen des HERRN, lobet, ihr Knechte des HERRN,
word.french1910: Louez l'Eternel! Louez le nom de l'Eternel, Louez-le, serviteurs de l'Eternel,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 頌讚　神的權能和揀選你們要讚美耶和華，你們要讚美耶和華的名；耶和華的眾僕人哪！你們都要讚美他。
word.korean: 할렐루야 여호와의 이름을 찬송하라 ! 여호와의 종들아 찬송하라 !
word.tagalog: Purihin ninyo ang Panginoon. Purihin ninyo ang pangalan ng Panginoon; purihin ninyo siya, Oh ninyong mga lingkod ng Panginoon:
word.maori: ¶ Whakamoemititia a Ihowa. Whakamoemititia te ingoa o Ihowa; whakamoemititia ia, e nga pononga a Ihowa.
word.cebuano: Dayegon ninyo si Jehova. Dayegon ninyo ang ngalan ni Jehova; Dayega siya , Oh kamong mga alagad ni Jehova,
word.hebrew: א  הללו-יה הללו את-שם יהוה    הללו עבדי יהוה
word.hebrewmodern: הללו יה הללו את שם יהוה הללו עבדי יהוה׃
word.greekot: αλληλουια ἐξομολογεῖσθε τῷ κυρίῳ ὅτι χρηστός ὅτι εἰς τὸν αἰῶνα τὸ ἔλεος αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: Praise the LORD; for the LORD is good: sing praises unto his name; for it is pleasant.
word.thailand: จงสรรเสริญพระเยโฮวาห์ เพราะพระเยโฮวาห์ประเสริฐ จงร้องเพลงสรรเสริญพระนามของพระองค์ เพราะการกระทำนั้นเพลิดเพลิน
word.spanish1909: Alabad á JAH, porque es bueno Jehová: Cantad salmos á su nombre, porque es suave.
word.latinvulgate: Confitemini Domino dominorum, quoniam in æternum misericordia ejus.
word.italian1927: Lodate l’Eterno, perché l’Eterno è buono; salmeggiate al suo nome, perché è amabile.
word.german1912: Lobet den HERRN, denn der HERR ist freundlich; lobsinget seinem Namen, denn er ist lieblich!
word.french1910: Louez l'Eternel! car l'Eternel est bon. Chantez à son nom! car il est favorable.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你們要讚美耶和華，因耶和華本是良善的；你們要歌頌他的名，因為他的名是美好的。
word.korean: 여호와를 찬송하라 ! 여호와는 선하시며 그 이름이 아름다우니 그 이름을 찬양하라 !
word.tagalog: Purihin ninyo ang Panginoon; sapagka't ang Panginoon ay mabuti: magsiawit kayo ng mga pagpuri sa kaniyang pangalan; sapagka't maligaya.
word.maori: Whakamoemititia a Ihowa; he pai hoki a Ihowa; himene atu ki tona ingoa; he mea ahuareka hoki tena.
word.cebuano: Dayegon ninyo si Jehova; kay si Jehova maayo man: Panag-awit ug mga pagdayeg sa iyang ngalan; kay kini maoy makalilipay.
word.hebrew: ג  הללו-יה כי-טוב יהוה    זמרו לשמו כי נעים
word.hebrewmodern: הללו יה כי טוב יהוה זמרו לשמו כי נעים׃
word.greekot: ἐξομολογεῖσθε τῷ κυρίῳ τῶν κυρίων ὅτι εἰς τὸν αἰῶνα τὸ ἔλεος αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: I will praise thee with my whole heart: before the gods will I sing praise unto thee.
word.thailand: ข้าพระองค์จะสรรเสริญพระองค์ด้วยสิ้นสุดใจของข้าพระองค์ ข้าพระองค์จะร้องเพลงสรรเสริญถวายพระองค์ต่อหน้าบรรดาพระ
word.spanish1909: Salmo de David. ALABARTE he con todo mi corazón: Delante de los dioses te cantaré salmos.
word.latinvulgate: In finem, psalmus David. Domine, probasti me, et cognovisti me ;
word.italian1927: Salmo di Davide. Io ti celebrerò con tutto il mio cuore, dinanzi agli dèi salmeggerò a te.
word.german1912: Davids. Ich danke dir von ganzem Herzen; vor den Göttern will ich dir lobsingen.
word.french1910: De David. Je te célèbre de tout mon coeur, Je chante tes louanges en la présence de Dieu.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 大衛的詩。我要一心稱謝你，我要在眾神面前歌頌你。（本節在《馬索拉抄本》包括細字標題）
word.korean: (다윗의 시) 내가 전심으로 주께 감사하며 신들 앞에서 주께 찬양하리이다
word.tagalog: Ako'y magpapasalamat sa iyo ng aking buong puso: sa harap ng mga dios ay aawit ako ng mga pagpuri sa iyo.
word.maori: ¶ Na Rawiri. Ka whakapaua toku ngakau ki te whakawhetai ki a koe: ka himene atu ahau ki a koe i te aroaro o nga atua.
word.cebuano: Magahatag ako kanimo sa mga pasalamat uban sa bug-os ko nga kasingkasing: Sa atubangan sa mga dios, magaawit ako kanimo ug mga pagdayeg.
word.hebrew: א  לדוד  אודך בכל-לבי    נגד אלהים אזמרך
word.hebrewmodern: לדוד אודך בכל לבי נגד אלהים אזמרך׃
word.greekot: εἰς τὸ τέλος ψαλμὸς τῷ δαυιδ κύριε ἐδοκίμασάς με καὶ ἔγνως με

word.kjv: I will worship toward thy holy temple, and praise thy name for thy lovingkindness and for thy truth: for thou hast magnified thy word above all thy name.
word.thailand: ข้าพระองค์กราบลงตรงมายังพระวิหารอันบริสุทธิ์ของพระองค์ และสรรเสริญพระนามของพระองค์ เพราะความเมตตาและความจริงของพระองค์ เพราะพระองค์ทรงเชิดชูพระวจนะของพระองค์เหนือพระนามทั้งหลายของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Encorvaréme al templo de tu santuario, Y alabaré tu nombre por tu misericordia y tu verdad: Porque has hecho magnífico tu nombre, y tu dicho sobre todas las cosas.
word.latinvulgate: tu cognovisti sessionem meam et resurrectionem meam.
word.italian1927: Adorerò vòlto al tempio della tua santità, celebrerò il tuo nome per la tua benignità e per la tua fedeltà; poiché tu hai magnificato la tua parola oltre ogni tua rinomanza.
word.german1912: Ich will anbeten zu deinem heiligen Tempel und deinem Namen danken für deine Güte und Treue; denn du hast deinen Namen über alles herrlich gemacht durch dein Wort.
word.french1910: Je me prosterne dans ton saint temple, Et je célèbre ton nom, à cause de ta bonté et de ta fidélité, Car ta renommée s'est accrue par l'accomplissemen de tes promesses.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我要向你的聖殿下拜，我要因你的慈愛和信實稱謝你的名；因為你使你的名和應許顯為大，超過一切（“因為你使你的名和應許顯為大，超過一切”原文作“因為你使你的應許顯為大，超過你的一切名字”）。
word.korean: 내가 주의 성전을 향하여 경배하며 주의 인자하심과 성실하심을 인하여 주의 이름에 감사하오리니 이는 주께서 주의 말씀을 주의 모든 이름 위에 높게 하셨음이라
word.tagalog: Ako'y sasamba sa dako ng iyong banal na templo, at magpapasalamat sa iyong pangalan, dahil sa iyong kagandahang-loob at dahil sa iyong katotohanan: sapagka't iyong pinadakila ang iyong salita sa iyong buong pangalan.
word.maori: Ka koropiko atu ahau ki te ritenga o tou temepara tapu, a ka whakamoemiti ki tou ingoa, mo tou aroha me tou pono: kua whakanuia hoki e koe tau kupu ki runga ake i tou ingoa katoa.
word.cebuano: Magasimba ako patumong sa imong templo nga balaan, Ug magahatag ako ug mga pasalamat sa imong ngalan, tungod sa imong mahigugmaong-kalolot ug sa imong kamatuoran: Kay gipadaku mo ang imong pulong ibabaw sa bug-os mong ngalan.
word.hebrew: ב  אשתחוה אל-היכל קדשך    ואודה את-שמך-- על-חסדך    ועל-אמתך כי-הגדלת על-כל-שמך    אמרתך
word.hebrewmodern: אשתחוה אל היכל קדשך ואודה את שמך על חסדך ועל אמתך כי הגדלת על כל שמך אמרתך׃
word.greekot: σὺ ἔγνως τὴν καθέδραν μου καὶ τὴν ἔγερσίν μου σὺ συνῆκας τοὺς διαλογισμούς μου ἀπὸ μακρόθεν

word.kjv: All the kings of the earth shall praise thee, O LORD, when they hear the words of thy mouth.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ บรรดากษัตริย์แห่งแผ่นดินโลกจะสรรเสริญพระองค์ เมื่อท่านเหล่านั้นได้ยินพระวจนะแห่งพระโอษฐ์ของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Confesarte han, oh Jehová, todos los reyes de la tierra, Cuando habrán oído los dichos de tu boca.
word.latinvulgate: et omnes vias meas prævidisti, quia non est sermo in lingua mea.
word.italian1927: Tutti i re della terra ti celebreranno, o Eterno, quando avranno udito le parole della tua bocca;
word.german1912: Es danken dir, HERR, alle Könige auf Erden, daß sie hören das Wort deines Mundes,
word.french1910: Tous les rois de la terre te loueront, ô Eternel! En entendant les paroles de ta bouche;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華啊！世上的君王都要稱謝你，因為他們聽見了你口中的言語。
word.korean: 여호와여, 땅의 열왕이 주께 감사할 것은 저희가 주의 입의 말씀을 들음이오며
word.tagalog: Lahat ng mga hari sa lupa ay mangagpapasalamat sa iyo, Oh Panginoon, sapagka't kanilang narinig ang mga salita ng iyong bibig.
word.maori: Ka whakamoemiti nga kingi katoa o te whenua ki a koe, e Ihowa, kua rongo hoki ratou ki nga kupu a tou mangai.
word.cebuano: Ang tanang mga hari sa yuta managhatag kanimo sa mga pasalamat, Oh Jehova, Kay nabati nila ang mga pulong nga gikan sa imong baba.
word.hebrew: ד  יודוך יהוה כל-מלכי-ארץ    כי שמעו אמרי-פיך
word.hebrewmodern: יודוך יהוה כל מלכי ארץ כי שמעו אמרי פיך׃
word.greekot: ὅτι οὐκ ἔστιν λόγος ἐν γλώσσῃ μου

word.kjv: I will praise thee; for I am fearfully and wonderfully made: marvellous are thy works; and that my soul knoweth right well.
word.thailand: ข้าพระองค์จะสรรเสริญพระองค์ เพราะข้าพระองค์ถูกสร้างมาอย่างแปลกประหลาดและน่ากลัว พระราชกิจของพระองค์มหัศจรรย์ จิตใจข้าพระองค์ทราบเรื่องนี้อย่างดี
word.spanish1909: Te alabaré; porque formidables, maravillosas son tus obras: Estoy maravillado, Y mi alma lo conoce mucho.
word.latinvulgate: Verumtamen justi confitebuntur nomini tuo ; et habitabunt recti cum vultu tuo.
word.italian1927: Io ti celebrerò, perché sono stato fatto in modo maraviglioso, stupendo. Maravigliose sono le tue opere, e l’anima mia lo sa molto bene.
word.german1912: Ich danke dir dafür, daß ich wunderbar gemacht bin; wunderbar sind deine Werke, und das erkennt meine Seele wohl.
word.french1910: Je te loue de ce que je suis une créature si merveilleuse. Tes oeuvres sont admirables, Et mon âme le reconnaît bien.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我要稱謝你，因為我的受造奇妙可畏；你的作為奇妙，這是我深深知道的。
word.korean: 내가 주께 감사하옴은 나를 지으심이 신묘막측하심이라 주의 행사가 기이함을 내 영혼이 잘 아나이다
word.tagalog: Ako'y magpapasalamat sa iyo; sapagka't nilalang ako na kakilakilabot at kagilagilalas: kagilagilalas ang iyong mga gawa; at nalalamang mabuti ng aking kaluluwa.
word.maori: Ka whakawhetai ahau ki a koe; he mea whakawehi, he mea whakamiharo toku hanganga; he mahi whakamiharo au mahi, mohio rawa ano toku wairua ki tena.
word.cebuano: Mohatag ako ug mga pasalamat kanimo; tungod kay makalilisang ug kahibulongan uyamut ang pagbuhat kanako: Kahibulongan man ang imong mga buhat; Ug kini hibaloan kaayo sa akong kalag.
word.hebrew: יד  אודך--    על כי נוראות נפליתי נפלאים מעשיך    ונפשי ידעת מאד
word.hebrewmodern: אודך על כי נוראות נפליתי נפלאים מעשיך ונפשי ידעת מאד׃
word.greekot: πλὴν δίκαιοι ἐξομολογήσονται τῷ ὀνόματί σου καὶ κατοικήσουσιν εὐθεῖς σὺν τῷ προσώπῳ σου

word.kjv: Bring my soul out of prison, that I may praise thy name: the righteous shall compass me about; for thou shalt deal bountifully with me.
word.thailand: ขอทรงพาจิตใจข้าพระองค์ออกจากคุก เพื่อข้าพระองค์จะสรรเสริญพระนามของพระองค์ คนชอบธรรมจะล้อมข้าพระองค์ไว้เพราะพระองค์จะทรงกระทำแก่ข้าพระองค์อย่างบริบูรณ์"
word.spanish1909: Saca mi alma de la cárcel para que alabe tu nombre: Me rodearán los justos, Porque tú me serás propicio.
word.latinvulgate: Velociter exaudi me, Domine ; defecit spiritus meus. Non avertas faciem tuam a me, et similis ero descendentibus in lacum.
word.italian1927: Trai di prigione l’anima mia, ond’io celebri il tuo nome. I giusti trionferanno meco, perché m’avrai colmato di beni.
word.german1912: Führe meine Seele aus dem Kerker, daß ich danke deinem Namen. Die Gerechten werden sich zu mir sammeln, wenn du mir wohltust.
word.french1910: Tire mon âme de sa prison, Afin que je célèbre ton nom! Les justes viendront m'entourer, Quand tu m'auras fait du bien.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 求你把我從牢獄中領出來，好讓我稱讚你的名；義人必環繞著我，因為你以厚恩待我。”
word.korean: 내 영혼을 옥에서 이끌어 내사 주의 이름을 감사케 하소서 주께서 나를 후대하시리니 의인이 나를 두르리이다
word.tagalog: Ilabas mo ang aking kaluluwa sa bilangguan, upang ako'y makapagpasalamat sa iyong pangalan: kubkubin ako ng matuwid; sapagka't ikaw ay gagawang may kagandahang-loob sa akin.
word.maori: Whakaputaina toku wairua i te herehere, kia whakamoemiti ai ahau ki tou ingoa: ka karapotia ahau e te hunga tika; nou ka atawhai nei i ahau.
word.cebuano: Kuhaa ang akong kalag gikan sa bilanggoan, Aron nga ako mohatag ug mga pasalamat sa imong ngalan: Ang mga matarung managlibut kanako; Kay ikaw sa pagkamadagayon gayud magapanalangin kanako.
word.hebrew: ז  הקשיבה אל-רנתי--    כי-דלותי-מאד הצילני מרדפי--    כי אמצו ממני [ (Psalms 142:8) ח  הוציאה ממסגר נפשי--    להודות את-שמך בי יכתרו צדיקים--    כי תגמל עלי ]
word.hebrewmodern: הוציאה ממסגר נפשי להודות את שמך בי יכתרו צדיקים כי תגמל עלי׃
word.greekot: ταχὺ εἰσάκουσόν μου κύριε ἐξέλιπεν τὸ πνεῦμά μου μὴ ἀποστρέψῃς τὸ πρόσωπόν σου ἀπ' ἐμοῦ καὶ ὁμοιωθήσομαι τοῖς καταβαίνουσιν εἰς λάκκον

word.kjv: I will sing a new song unto thee, O God: upon a psaltery and an instrument of ten strings will I sing praises unto thee.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเจ้า ข้าพระองค์จะร้องเพลงบทใหม่ถวายแด่พระองค์ ข้าพระองค์จะร้องเพลงสรรเสริญพระองค์ด้วยพิณใหญ่และพิณสิบสาย
word.spanish1909: Oh Dios, á ti cantaré canción nueva: Con salterio, con decacordio cantaré á ti.
word.latinvulgate: Suavis Dominus universis ; et miserationes ejus super omnia opera ejus.
word.italian1927: O Dio, a te canterò un nuovo cantico; sul saltèro a dieci corde a te salmeggerò,
word.german1912: Gott, ich will dir ein neues Lied singen, ich will dir spielen auf dem Psalter von zehn Saiten,
word.french1910: O Dieu! je te chanterai un cantique nouveau, Je te célébrerai sur le luth à dix cordes.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神啊！我要向你唱新歌，我要用十弦琴向你歌唱。
word.korean: 하나님이여, 내가 주께 새 노래로 노래하며 열줄 비파로 주를 찬양하리이다
word.tagalog: Ako'y aawit ng bagong awit sa iyo, Oh Dios: sa salterio na may sangpung kawad ay aawit ako ng mga pagpuri sa iyo.
word.maori: ¶ Ka waiatatia e ahau he waiata hou ki a koe, e te Atua: ka himene atu ahau ki a koe i runga i te hatere aho tekau.
word.cebuano: Moawit ako ug bag-ong alawiton kanimo, Oh Dios: Sa salterio nga may napulo ka kuldas moawit ako ug mga pagdayeg kanimo.
word.hebrew: ט  אלהים--שיר חדש אשירה לך    בנבל עשור אזמרה-לך
word.hebrewmodern: אלהים שיר חדש אשירה לך בנבל עשור אזמרה לך׃
word.greekot: χρηστὸς κύριος τοῖς σύμπασιν καὶ οἱ οἰκτιρμοὶ αὐτοῦ ἐπὶ πάντα τὰ ἔργα αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: Happy is that people, that is in such a case: yea, happy is that people, whose God is the LORD.
word.thailand: ชนชาติผู้มีพระพรอย่างนี้หลั่งลงมาถึงก็เป็นสุข ชนชาติซึ่งพระเจ้าของเขาคือพระเยโฮวาห์ก็เป็นสุข
word.spanish1909: Bienaventurado el pueblo que tiene esto: Bienaventurado el pueblo cuyo Dios es Jehová.
word.latinvulgate: Oculi omnium in te sperant, Domine ; et tu das escam illorum in tempore opportuno.
word.italian1927: Beato il popolo che è in tale stato, beato il popolo il cui Dio è l’Eterno.
word.german1912: Wohl dem Volk, dem es also geht! Wohl dem Volk, des Gott der HERR ist!
word.french1910: Heureux le peuple pour qui il en est ainsi! Heureux le peuple dont l'Eternel est le Dieu!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 得享這樣景況的人民，是有福的，有耶和華作他們　神的，這人是有福的。
word.korean: 이러한 백성은 복이 있나니 여호와를 자기 하나님으로 삼는 백성은 복이 있도다
word.tagalog: Maginhawa ang bayan, na nasa gayong kalagayan: maginhawa ang bayan na ang Dios ay ang Panginoon.
word.maori: Ka hari te iwi e pena ana: ae, ka hari te iwi ko Ihowa nei to ratou Atua.
word.cebuano: Malipayon ang katawohan nga anaa sa maong kahimtang; Oo , malipayon ang katawohan kansang Dios mao si Jehova.
word.hebrew: טו  אשרי העם שככה לו    אשרי העם שיהוה אלהיו
word.hebrewmodern: אשרי העם שככה לו אשרי העם שיהוה אלהיו׃
word.greekot: οἱ ὀφθαλμοὶ πάντων εἰς σὲ ἐλπίζουσιν καὶ σὺ δίδως τὴν τροφὴν αὐτῶν ἐν εὐκαιρίᾳ

word.kjv: Every day will I bless thee; and I will praise thy name for ever and ever.
word.thailand: ข้าพระองค์จะถวายสาธุการแด่พระองค์ทุกๆวัน ข้าพระองค์จะสรรเสริญพระนามของพระองค์เป็นนิจกาล
word.spanish1909: Cada día te bendeciré, Y alabaré tu nombre por siglo y para siempre.
word.latinvulgate: Lauda, anima mea, Dominum. Laudabo Dominum in vita mea ; psallam Deo meo quamdiu fuero. Nolite confidere in principibus,
word.italian1927: Ogni giorno ti benedirò e loderò il tuo nome in sempiterno.
word.german1912: Ich will dich täglich loben und deinen Namen rühmen immer und ewiglich.
word.french1910: Chaque jour je te bénirai, Et je célébrerai ton nom à toujours et à perpétuité.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我要天天稱頌你，我要永永遠遠讚美你的名。
word.korean: 내가 날마다 주를 송축하며 영영히 주의 이름을 송축하리이다
word.tagalog: Araw-araw ay pupurihin kita; at aking pupurihin ang pangalan mo magpakailan-kailan pa man.
word.maori: Ka whakapai ahau ki a koe i nga ra katoa: ka whakamoemiti ki tou ingoa ake ake.
word.cebuano: Sa matag-adlaw pagadayegon ko ikaw; Ug magadayeg ako sa imong ngalan hangtud sa mga katuigan nga walay katapusan.
word.hebrew: ב  בכל-יום אברכך    ואהללה שמך לעולם ועד
word.hebrewmodern: בכל יום אברכך ואהללה שמך לעולם ועד׃
word.greekot: αἰνέσω κύριον ἐν ζωῇ μου ψαλῶ τῷ θεῷ μου ἕως ὑπάρχω

word.kjv: Great is the LORD, and greatly to be praised; and his greatness is unsearchable.
word.thailand: พระเยโฮวาห์นั้นยิ่งใหญ่ และสมควรจะสรรเสริญอย่างยิ่ง ความใหญ่ยิ่งของพระองค์นั้นเหลือจะหยั่งรู้
word.spanish1909: Grande es Jehová y digno de suprema alabanza: Y su grandeza es inescrutable.
word.latinvulgate: in filiis hominum, in quibus non est salus.
word.italian1927: L’Eterno è grande e degno di somma lode, e la sua grandezza non si può investigare.
word.german1912: Der HERR ist groß und sehr löblich, und seine Größe ist unausforschlich.
word.french1910: L'Eternel est grand et très digne de louange, Et sa grandeur est insondable.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華是至大的，配受極大的讚美，他的偉大無法測度。
word.korean: 여호와는 광대하시니 크게 찬양할 것이라 그의 광대하심을 측량치 못하리로다
word.tagalog: Dakila ang Panginoon, at marapat na purihin; at ang kaniyang kadakilaan ay hindi masayod.
word.maori: He nui a Ihowa, kia nui ano te whakamoemiti ki a ia: e kore e taea tona nui te rapu.
word.cebuano: Daku man si Jehova, ug takus gayud nga pagadayegon; Ug ang iyang pagkadaku dili gayud matukib.
word.hebrew: ג  גדול יהוה ומהלל מאד    ולגדלתו אין חקר
word.hebrewmodern: גדול יהוה ומהלל מאד ולגדלתו אין חקר׃
word.greekot: μὴ πεποίθατε ἐπ' ἄρχοντας καὶ ἐφ' υἱοὺς ἀνθρώπων οἷς οὐκ ἔστιν σωτηρία

word.kjv: One generation shall praise thy works to another, and shall declare thy mighty acts.
word.thailand: คนชั่วอายุหนึ่งจะสรรเสริญพระราชกิจของพระองค์ให้คนอีกชั่วอายุหนึ่งฟัง และจะประกาศกิจการอันทรงอานุภาพของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Generación á generación narrará tus obras, Y anunciarán tus valentías.
word.latinvulgate: Exibit spiritus ejus, et revertetur in terram suam ; in illa die peribunt omnes cogitationes eorum.
word.italian1927: Un’età dirà all’altra le lodi delle tue opere, e farà conoscer le tue gesta.
word.german1912: Kindeskinder werden deine Werke preisen und von deiner Gewalt sagen.
word.french1910: Que chaque génération célèbre tes oeuvres, Et publie tes hauts faits!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 世世代代的人都要頌讚你的作為，他們要傳揚你大能的作為。
word.korean: 대대로 주의 행사를 크게 칭송하며 주의 능한 일을 선포하리로다
word.tagalog: Ang isang lahi ay pupuri ng iyong mga gawa sa isa. At ipahahayag ang iyong mga makapangyarihang gawa.
word.maori: Ma tetahi whakatupuranga e whakamoemiti au mahi, tae noa atu ki tetahi whakatupuranga; e korero hoki au mahi nunui.
word.cebuano: Ang imong mga buhat igasugid nga may pagdayeg sa mga kaliwatan ngadto sa mga kaliwatan, Ug magamantala sa imong mga gamhanang buhat.
word.hebrew: ד  דור לדור ישבח מעשיך    וגבורתיך יגידו
word.hebrewmodern: דור לדור ישבח מעשיך וגבורתיך יגידו׃
word.greekot: ἐξελεύσεται τὸ πνεῦμα αὐτοῦ καὶ ἐπιστρέψει εἰς τὴν γῆν αὐτοῦ ἐν ἐκείνῃ τῇ ἡμέρᾳ ἀπολοῦνται πάντες οἱ διαλογισμοὶ αὐτῶν

word.kjv: All thy works shall praise thee, O LORD; and thy saints shall bless thee.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ พระราชกิจทั้งสิ้นของพระองค์จะสรรเสริญพระองค์ และวิสุทธิชนทั้งสิ้นของพระองค์จะถวายสาธุการแด่พระองค์
word.spanish1909: Alábente, oh Jehová, todas tus obras; Y tus santos te bendigan.
word.latinvulgate: Regnabit Dominus in sæcula ; Deus tuus, Sion, in generationem et generationem.
word.italian1927: Tutte le tue opere ti celebreranno, o Eterno, e i tuoi fedeli ti benediranno.
word.german1912: Es sollen dir danken, HERR, alle deine Werke und deine Heiligen dich loben
word.french1910: Toutes tes oeuvres te loueront, ô Eternel! Et tes fidèles te béniront.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華啊！你一切所造的都要稱謝你，你的聖民也要稱頌你。
word.korean: 여호와여, 주의 지으신 모든 것이 주께 감사하며 주의 성도가 주를 송축하리이다
word.tagalog: Lahat mong mga gawa ay mangagpapasalamat sa iyo Oh Panginoon; at pupurihin ka ng iyong mga banal.
word.maori: ¶ E whakamoemititia koe, e Ihowa, e au mahi katoa: e whakapaingia e tou hunga tapu.
word.cebuano: Ang tanan mong mga buhat managpasalamat kanimo, Oh Jehova; Ug ang imong mga balaan managdayeg kanimo.
word.hebrew: י  יודוך יהוה כל-מעשיך    וחסידיך יברכוכה
word.hebrewmodern: יודוך יהוה כל מעשיך וחסידיך יברכוכה׃
word.greekot: βασιλεύσει κύριος εἰς τὸν αἰῶνα ὁ θεός σου σιων εἰς γενεὰν καὶ γενεάν

word.kjv: My mouth shall speak the praise of the LORD: and let all flesh bless his holy name for ever and ever.
word.thailand: ปากของข้าพเจ้าจะกล่าวสรรเสริญพระเยโฮวาห์ และให้บรรดาเนื้อหนังทั้งสิ้นถวายสาธุการแด่พระนามบริสุทธิ์ของพระองค์เป็นนิจกาล
word.spanish1909: La alabanza de Jehová hablará mi boca; Y bendiga toda carne su santo nombre por siglo y para siempre.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: La mia bocca proclamerà la lode dell’Eterno, e ogni carne benedirà il nome della sua santità, in sempiterno.
word.german1912: Mein Mund soll des HERRN Lob sagen, und alles Fleisch lobe seinen heiligen Namen immer und ewiglich.
word.french1910: Que ma bouche publie la louange de l'Eternel, Et que toute chair bénisse son saint nom, A toujours et à perpétuité!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我的口要說讚美耶和華的話；願所有的人都永永遠遠稱頌他的聖名。
word.korean: 내 입이 여호와의 영예를 말하며 모든 육체가 그의 성호를 영영히 송축할지로다 !
word.tagalog: Ang aking bibig ay magsasalita ng kapurihan ng Panginoon; at purihin ng lahat na laman ang kaniyang banal na pangalan magpakailan-kailan pa man.
word.maori: Ma toku mangai e korero te whakamoemiti ki a Ihowa: kia whakapai ano hoki nga kikokiko katoa ki tona ingoa tapu ake ake.
word.cebuano: Ang akong baba magasulti sa pagdayeg kang Jehova; Ug ipapagdayeg sa tanan nga unod ang iyang balaan nga ngalan hangtud sa mga katuigan nga walay katapusan.
word.hebrew: כא  תהלת יהוה ידבר-פי    ויברך כל-בשר שם קדשו--לעולם ועד
word.hebrewmodern: תהלת יהוה ידבר פי ויברך כל בשר שם קדשו לעולם ועד׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: While I live will I praise the LORD: I will sing praises unto my God while I have any being.
word.thailand: ข้าพเจ้าจะสรรเสริญพระเยโฮวาห์ตราบเท่าที่ข้าพเจ้ามีชีวิตอยู่ ข้าพเจ้าจะร้องเพลงสรรเสริญพระเจ้าของข้าพเจ้าขณะที่ข้าพเจ้ายังเป็นอยู่
word.spanish1909: Alabaré á Jehová en mi vida: Cantaré salmos á mi Dios mientras viviere.
word.latinvulgate: Ædificans Jerusalem Dominus, dispersiones Israëlis congregabit ;
word.italian1927: Io loderò l’Eterno finché vivrò, salmeggerò al mio Dio, finché esisterò.
word.german1912: Ich will den HERRN loben, solange ich lebe, und meinem Gott lobsingen, solange ich hier bin.
word.french1910: Je louerai l'Eternel tant que je vivrai, Je célébrerai mon Dieu tant que j'existerai.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我還活著的時候，我要讚美耶和華；我還在世上的時候，我要歌頌我的　神。
word.korean: 나의 생전에 여호와를 찬양하며 나의 평생에 내 하나님을 찬송하리로다 !
word.tagalog: Samantalang ako'y nabubuhay ay pupurihin ko ang Panginoon: ako'y aawit ng mga pagpuri sa aking Dios, samantalang ako'y may buhay.
word.maori: I ahau e ora nei ka whakamoemiti ahau ki a Ihowa; ka himene ahau ki toku Atua i ahau i te ao nei.
word.cebuano: Samtang buhi pa ako magadayeg ako kang Jehova: Magaawit ako ug mga pagdayeg sa akong Dios samtang buhi pa ako.
word.hebrew: ב  אהללה יהוה בחיי    אזמרה לאלהי בעודי
word.hebrewmodern: אהללה יהוה בחיי אזמרה לאלהי בעודי׃
word.greekot: οἰκοδομῶν ιερουσαλημ ὁ κύριος καὶ τὰς διασπορὰς τοῦ ισραηλ ἐπισυνάξει

word.kjv: Praise ye the LORD: for it is good to sing praises unto our God; for it is pleasant; and praise is comely.
word.thailand: จงสรรเสริญพระเยโฮวาห์เถิด เป็นการดีที่จะร้องเพลงสรรเสริญพระเจ้าของเรา เพราะการกระทำนั้นเป็นที่น่ายินดีและการสรรเสริญก็เหมาะสม
word.spanish1909: ALABAD á JAH, Porque es bueno cantar salmos á nuestro Dios; Porque suave y hermosa es la alabanza.
word.latinvulgate: Alleluja. Lauda, Jerusalem, Dominum ; lauda Deum tuum, Sion.
word.italian1927: Lodate l’Eterno, perché è cosa buona salmeggiare al nostro Dio; perché è cosa dolce, e la lode è convenevole.
word.german1912: Lobet den HERR! denn unsern Gott loben, das ist ein köstlich Ding; solch Lob ist lieblich und schön.
word.french1910: Louez l'Eternel! Car il est beau de célébrer notre Dieu, Car il est doux, il est bienséant de le louer.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 稱頌　神復興耶路撒冷之恩你們要讚美耶和華。歌頌我們的　神，這是多麼美善，讚美他，這是美好的，是合宜的。
word.korean: 할렐루야 ! 우리 하나님께 찬양함이 선함이여 찬송함이 아름답고 마땅하도다
word.tagalog: Purihin ninyo ang Panginoon; sapagka't mabuting umawit ng mga pagpuri sa ating Dios; sapagka't maligaya, at ang pagpuri ay nakalulugod.
word.maori: ¶ Whakamoemititia a Ihowa; he pai hoki te himene ki to tatou Atua: ahuareka rawa, ataahua tonu te whakamoemiti.
word.cebuano: Dayegon ninyo si Jehova; Kay maayo man ang pag-awit ug mga pagdayeg sa atong Dios; Kay kini matahum ug angay ang pagdayeg.
word.hebrew: א  הללו-יה כי-טוב זמרה אלהינו--    כי-נעים נאוה תהלה
word.hebrewmodern: הללו יה כי טוב זמרה אלהינו כי נעים נאוה תהלה׃
word.greekot: αλληλουια αγγαιου καὶ ζαχαριου ἐπαίνει ιερουσαλημ τὸν κύριον αἴνει τὸν θεόν σου σιων

word.kjv: Sing unto the LORD with thanksgiving; sing praise upon the harp unto our God:
word.thailand: จงร้องเพลงโมทนาพระคุณถวายพระเยโฮวาห์ จงร้องเพลงสรรเสริญพระเจ้าของเราด้วยพิณเขาคู่
word.spanish1909: Cantad á Jehová con alabanza, Cantad con arpa á nuestro Dios.
word.latinvulgate: Emittet verbum suum, et liquefaciet ea ; flabit spiritus ejus, et fluent aquæ.
word.italian1927: Cantate all’Eterno inni di lode, salmeggiate con la cetra all’Iddio nostro,
word.german1912: Singet umeinander dem HERRN mit Dank und lobet unsern Gott mit Harfen,
word.french1910: Chantez à l'Eternel avec actions de grâces, Célébrez notre Dieu avec la harpe!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你們要以感謝的心向耶和華歌唱，用琴向我們的　神歌頌。
word.korean: 감사함으로 여호와께 노래하며 수금으로 하나님께 찬양할지어다 !
word.tagalog: Magsiawit kayo sa Panginoon ng pagpapasalamat; magsiawit kayo sa alpa ng mga pagpuri sa ating Dios:
word.maori: Waiata, whakawhetai ki a Ihowa: himene i runga i te hapa ki to tatou Atua:
word.cebuano: Manag-awit kamo kang Jehova nga adunay mga pasalamat; Manag-awit kamo nga adunay alpa ngadto sa atong Dios,
word.hebrew: ז  ענו ליהוה בתודה    זמרו לאלהינו בכנור
word.hebrewmodern: ענו ליהוה בתודה זמרו לאלהינו בכנור׃
word.greekot: ἀποστελεῖ τὸν λόγον αὐτοῦ καὶ τήξει αὐτά πνεύσει τὸ πνεῦμα αὐτοῦ καὶ ῥυήσεται ὕδατα

word.kjv: Praise the LORD, O Jerusalem; praise thy God, O Zion.
word.thailand: เยรูซาเล็มเอ๋ย จงสรรเสริญพระเยโฮวาห์เถิด ศิโยนเอ๋ย จงถวายสรรเสริญแด่พระเจ้าของเธอ
word.spanish1909: Alaba á Jehová, Jerusalem; Alaba á tu Dios, Sión.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Celebra l’Eterno, o Gerusalemme! Loda il tuo Dio, o Sion!
word.german1912: Preise, Jerusalem, den HERRN; lobe Zion, deinen Gott!
word.french1910: Jérusalem, célèbre l'Eternel! Sion, loue ton Dieu!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶路撒冷啊！你要頌讚耶和華；錫安哪！你要讚美你的　神。
word.korean: 예루살렘아 여호와를 찬송할지어다 ! 시온아 네 하나님을 찬양할지어다 !
word.tagalog: Purihin mo ang Panginoon, Oh Jerusalem; purihin mo ang iyong Dios, Oh Sion.
word.maori: ¶ Whakamoemititia a Ihowa, e Hiruharama: whakamoemititia tou Atua, e Hiona.
word.cebuano: Dayega si Jehova, Oh Jerusalem; Dayegon mo ang imong Dios, Oh Sion.
word.hebrew: יב  שבחי ירושלם את-יהוה    הללי אלהיך ציון
word.hebrewmodern: שבחי ירושלם את יהוה הללי אלהיך ציון׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Praise ye the LORD. Praise ye the LORD from the heavens: praise him in the heights.
word.thailand: จงสรรเสริญพระเยโฮวาห์เถิด จงสรรเสริญพระเยโฮวาห์จากฟ้าสวรรค์ จงสรรเสริญพระองค์ในที่สูง
word.spanish1909: Aleluya. ALABAD á Jehová desde los cielos: Alabadle en las alturas.
word.latinvulgate: Alleluja. Laudate Dominum de cælis ; laudate eum in excelsis.
word.italian1927: Alleluia. Lodate l’Eterno dai cieli, lodatelo nei luoghi altissimi.
word.german1912: Halleluja! Lobet im Himmel den HERRN; lobet ihn in der Höhe!
word.french1910: Louez l'Eternel! Louez l'Eternel du haut des cieux! Louez-le dans les lieux élevés!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 宇宙萬物都要讚美　神你們要讚美耶和華。你們要從天上讚美耶和華，在高天讚美他。
word.korean: 할렐루야 ! 하늘에서 여호와를 찬양하며 높은 데서 찬양할지어다 !
word.tagalog: Purihin ninyo ang Panginoon. Purihin ninyo ang Panginoon mula sa mga langit: purihin ninyo siya sa mga kaitaasan.
word.maori: ¶ Whakamoemititia a Ihowa. Whakamoemititia a Ihowa i runga i nga rangi: whakamoemititia ia i nga wahi tiketike.
word.cebuano: Dayegon ninyo si Jehova. Dayegon ninyo si Jehova gikan sa kalangitan: Dayegon ninyo siya diha sa mga kahitas-an.
word.hebrew: א  הללו-יה הללו את-יהוה מן-השמים    הללוהו במרומים
word.hebrewmodern: הללו יה הללו את יהוה מן השמים הללוהו במרומים׃
word.greekot: αλληλουια αγγαιου καὶ ζαχαριου αἰνεῖτε τὸν κύριον ἐκ τῶν οὐρανῶν αἰνεῖτε αὐτὸν ἐν τοῖς ὑψίστοις

word.kjv: Praise ye him, all his angels: praise ye him, all his hosts.
word.thailand: ทูตสวรรค์ทั้งหลายของพระองค์ จงสรรเสริญพระองค์ บรรดาพลโยธาของพระองค์ จงสรรเสริญพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Alabadle, vosotros todos sus ángeles: Alabadle, vosotros todos sus ejércitos.
word.latinvulgate: Laudate eum, omnes angeli ejus ; laudate eum, omnes virtutes ejus.
word.italian1927: Lodatelo, voi tutti gli angeli suoi, lodatelo, voi tutti i suoi eserciti!
word.german1912: Lobet ihn, alle seine Engel; lobet ihn, all sein Heer!
word.french1910: Louez-le, vous tous ses anges! Louez-le, vous toutes ses armées!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他的眾使者啊！你們要讚美他；他的眾軍啊！你們也要讚美他。
word.korean: 그의 모든 사자여 찬양하며 모든 군대여 찬양할지어다 !
word.tagalog: Purihin ninyo siya, ninyong lahat niyang mga anghel: purihin ninyo siya, buo niyang hukbo.
word.maori: Whakamoemititia ia, e ana anahera katoa: whakamoemititia ia, e ana mano whaioio.
word.cebuano: Dayegon ninyo siya, kamong tanang mga manolonda: Dayegon ninyo siya, kamong tanang mga panon niya.
word.hebrew: ב  הללוהו כל-מלאכיו    הללוהו כל-צבאו
word.hebrewmodern: הללוהו כל מלאכיו הללוהו כל צבאו׃
word.greekot: αἰνεῖτε αὐτόν πάντες οἱ ἄγγελοι αὐτοῦ αἰνεῖτε αὐτόν πᾶσαι αἱ δυνάμεις αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: Praise ye him, sun and moon: praise him, all ye stars of light.
word.thailand: ดวงอาทิตย์และดวงจันทร์ จงสรรเสริญพระองค์ บรรดาดาวที่ส่องแสง จงสรรเสริญพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Alabadle, sol y luna: Alabadle, vosotras todas, lucientes estrellas.
word.latinvulgate: Laudate eum, sol et luna ; laudate eum, omnes stellæ et lumen.
word.italian1927: Lodatelo, sole e luna, lodatelo voi tutte, stelle lucenti!
word.german1912: Lobet ihn, Sonne und Mond; lobet ihn, alle leuchtenden Sterne!
word.french1910: Louez-le, soleil et lune! Louez-le, vous toutes, étoiles lumineuses!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 太陽和月亮啊！你們要讚美他；光亮的星星啊！你們都要讚美他。
word.korean: 해와 달아 찬양하며 광명한 별들아 찬양할지어다 !
word.tagalog: Purihin ninyo siya, araw at buwan: purihin ninyo siya, ninyong lahat na mga bituing maliwanag.
word.maori: Whakamoemititia ia, e te ra, e te marama: whakamoemititia ia, e nga whetu whakamarama katoa.
word.cebuano: Dayegon ninyo siya, adlaw ug bulan: Dayegon ninyo siya, kamong tanang kabitoonan sa kahayag.
word.hebrew: ג  הללוהו שמש וירח    הללוהו כל-כוכבי אור
word.hebrewmodern: הללוהו שמש וירח הללוהו כל כוכבי אור׃
word.greekot: αἰνεῖτε αὐτόν ἥλιος καὶ σελήνη αἰνεῖτε αὐτόν πάντα τὰ ἄστρα καὶ τὸ φῶς

word.kjv: Let them praise the name of the LORD: for he commanded, and they were created.
word.thailand: ให้สิ่งเหล่านั้นสรรเสริญพระนามพระเยโฮวาห์ เพราะพระองค์ทรงบัญชา สิ่งเหล่านั้นก็ถูกเนรมิตขึ้นมา
word.spanish1909: Alaben el nombre de Jehová; Porque él mandó, y fueron criadas.
word.latinvulgate: laudent nomen Domini. Quia ipse dixit, et facta sunt ; ipse mandavit, et creata sunt.
word.italian1927: Tutte queste cose lodino il nome dell’Eterno, perch’egli comandò, e furon create;
word.german1912: Die sollen loben den Namen des HERRN; denn er gebot, da wurden sie geschaffen.
word.french1910: Qu'ils louent le nom de l'Eternel! Car il a commandé, et ils ont été créés.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 願這一切都讚美耶和華的名，因為他一發令，它們就都造成。
word.korean: 그것들이 여호와의 이름을 찬양할 것은 저가 명하시매 지음을 받았음이로다
word.tagalog: Purihin nila ang pangalan ng Panginoon: sapagka't siya'y nagutos, at sila'y nangalikha.
word.maori: Kia whakamoemititia e ratou te ingoa o Ihowa: nana hoki i whakahau, a kua hanga ratou.
word.cebuano: Ipapagdayeg kanila ang ngalan ni Jehova; Kay siya nagsugo, ug sila nangahimo.
word.hebrew: ה  יהללו את-שם יהוה    כי הוא צוה ונבראו
word.hebrewmodern: יהללו את שם יהוה כי הוא צוה ונבראו׃
word.greekot: αἰνεσάτωσαν τὸ ὄνομα κυρίου ὅτι αὐτὸς εἶπεν καὶ ἐγενήθησαν αὐτὸς ἐνετείλατο καὶ ἐκτίσθησαν

word.kjv: Let them praise the name of the LORD: for his name alone is excellent; his glory is above the earth and heaven.
word.thailand: ให้ทั้งหลายเหล่านี้สรรเสริญพระนามพระเยโฮวาห์ เพราะพระนามของพระองค์เท่านั้นที่ประเสริฐ สง่าราศีของพระองค์อยู่เหนือแผ่นดินโลกและฟ้าสวรรค์
word.spanish1909: Alaben el nombre de Jehová, Porque sólo su nombre es elevado; Su gloria es sobre tierra y cielos.
word.latinvulgate: quia exaltatum est nomen ejus solius.
word.italian1927: Lodino il nome dell’Eterno; perché il nome suo solo è esaltato; la sua maestà è al disopra della terra e del cielo.
word.german1912: Die sollen loben den Namen des HERRN; denn sein Name allein ist hoch, sein Lob geht, soweit Himmel und Erde ist.
word.french1910: Qu'ils louent le nom de l'Eternel! Car son nom seul est élevé; Sa majesté est au-dessus de la terre et des cieux.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 願這一切都讚美耶和華的名，因為獨有他的名被尊崇，他的榮耀超越天地。
word.korean: 다 여호와의 이름을 찬양할지어다 그 이름이 홀로 높으시며 그 영광이 천지에 뛰어나심이로다
word.tagalog: Purihin nila ang pangalan ng Panginoon; sapagka't ang kaniyang pangalan magisa ay nabunyi: ang kaniyang kaluwalhatian ay nasa itaas ng lupa at mga langit.
word.maori: Kia whakamoemititia e ratou te ingoa o Ihowa: nona anake hoki te ingoa e nui ana; kei runga ake i te whenua, i te rangi, tona kororia.
word.cebuano: Ipapagdayeg kanila ang ngalan ni Jehova; Kay ang iyang ngalan lamang mao ang gibayaw; Ang iyang himaya maoy labaw sa yuta ug sa kalangitan.
word.hebrew: יג  יהללו את-שם יהוה--    כי-נשגב שמו לבדו הודו    על-ארץ ושמים
word.hebrewmodern: יהללו את שם יהוה כי נשגב שמו לבדו הודו על ארץ ושמים׃
word.greekot: αἰνεσάτωσαν τὸ ὄνομα κυρίου ὅτι ὑψώθη τὸ ὄνομα αὐτοῦ μόνου ἡ ἐξομολόγησις αὐτοῦ ἐπὶ γῆς καὶ οὐρανοῦ

word.kjv: He also exalteth the horn of his people, the praise of all his saints; even of the children of Israel, a people near unto him. Praise ye the LORD.
word.thailand: พระองค์ทรงยกย่องเขาแห่งประชาชนของพระองค์ ผู้ทรงเป็นที่สรรเสริญของบรรดาวิสุทธิชนของพระองค์ คือชนชาติอิสราเอล ประชาชนที่อยู่ใกล้พระองค์ จงสรรเสริญพระเยโฮวาห์เถิด
word.spanish1909: El ensalzó el cuerno de su pueblo; Aláben le todos sus santos, los hijos de Israel, El pueblo á él cercano. Aleluya.
word.latinvulgate: Confessio ejus super cælum et terram ; et exaltavit cornu populi sui. Hymnus omnibus sanctis ejus ; filiis Israël, populo appropinquanti sibi. Alleluja.
word.italian1927: Egli ha ridato forza al suo popolo, dando motivo di lode a tutti i suoi fedeli, ai figliuoli d’Israele, al popolo che gli sta vicino. Alleluia.
word.german1912: Und erhöht das Horn seines Volkes. Alle Heiligen sollen loben, die Kinder Israel, das Volk, das ihm dient. Halleluja!
word.french1910: Il a relevé la force de son peuple: Sujet de louange pour tous ses fidèles, Pour les enfants d'Israël, du peuple qui est près de lui. Louez l'Eternel!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他使自己子民的角得以高舉（“他使自己子民的角得以高舉”或譯：“他為自己的子民興起一個君王”；“君王”原文作“角”），他所有的聖民，就是和他接近的以色列人，都讚美他。你們要讚美耶和華。
word.korean: 저가 그 백성의 뿔을 높이셨으니 저는 모든 성도 곧 저를 친근히 하는 이스라엘 자손의 찬양거리로다 할렐루야 !
word.tagalog: At itinaas niya ang sungay ng kaniyang bayan, ang papuri ng lahat niyang mga banal; sa makatuwid baga'y ng mga anak ni Israel, na bayang malapit sa kaniya. Purihin ninyo ang Panginoon.
word.maori: Ko ia hoki te kaiwhakaara o te haona o tana iwi; e whakamoemititia ana e ana tangata tapu katoa; e nga tama a Iharaira, e te iwi e tata ana ki a ia. Whakamoemititia a Ihowa.
word.cebuano: Ug ginabayaw niya ang sungay sa iyang katawohan, Ang pagdayeg sa tanan niyang mga balaan; Bisan sa mga anak sa Israel, ang katawohan nga haduol kaniya. Dayegon ninyo si Jehova.
word.hebrew: יד  וירם קרן לעמו    תהלה לכל-חסידיו-- לבני ישראל    עם קרבו הללו-יה
word.hebrewmodern: וירם קרן לעמו תהלה לכל חסידיו לבני ישראל עם קרבו הללו יה׃
word.greekot: καὶ ὑψώσει κέρας λαοῦ αὐτοῦ ὕμνος πᾶσι τοῖς ὁσίοις αὐτοῦ τοῖς υἱοῖς ισραηλ λαῷ ἐγγίζοντι αὐτῷ

word.kjv: Praise ye the LORD. Sing unto the LORD a new song, and his praise in the congregation of saints.
word.thailand: จงสรรเสริญพระเยโฮวาห์เถิด จงร้องเพลงบทใหม่ถวายพระเยโฮวาห์ ร้องบทสรรเสริญถวายพระองค์ในชุมนุมวิสุทธิชน
word.spanish1909: Aleluya. CANTAD á Jehová canción nueva: Su alabanza sea en la congregación de los santos.
word.latinvulgate: Alleluja. Cantate Domino canticum novum ; laus ejus in ecclesia sanctorum.
word.italian1927: Alleluia. Cantate all’Eterno un nuovo cantico, cantate la sua lode nell’assemblea dei fedeli.
word.german1912: Halleluja! Singet dem HERRN ein neues Lied; die Gemeinde der Heiligen soll ihn loben.
word.french1910: Louez l'Eternel! Chantez à l'Eternel un cantique nouveau! Chantez ses louanges dans l'assemblée des fidèles!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 以色列應當讚美　神你們要讚美耶和華，要向耶和華唱新歌，在聖民的會中讚美他。
word.korean: 할렐루야 ! 새 노래로 여호와께 노래하며 성도의 회중에서 찬양할지어다 !
word.tagalog: Purihin ninyo ang Panginoon. Magsiawit kayo sa Panginoon ng bagong awit, at ng kaniyang kapurihan sa kapisanan ng mga banal.
word.maori: ¶ Whakamoemititia a Ihowa. Waiatatia ki a Ihowa he waiata hou, me te whakamoemiti ki a ia i te whakaminenga o te hunga tapu.
word.cebuano: Dayegon ninyo si Jehova. Panag-awit kamo kang Jehova ug bag-ong alawiton, Ug ang iyang pagdayeg diha sa katilingban sa mga balaan.
word.hebrew: א  הללו-יה שירו ליהוה שיר חדש    תהלתו בקהל חסידים
word.hebrewmodern: הללו יה שירו ליהוה שיר חדש תהלתו בקהל חסידים׃
word.greekot: αλληλουια ᾄσατε τῷ κυρίῳ ἆ|σμα καινόν ἡ αἴνεσις αὐτοῦ ἐν ἐκκλησίᾳ ὁσίων

word.kjv: Let them praise his name in the dance: let them sing praises unto him with the timbrel and harp.
word.thailand: ให้เขาสรรเสริญพระนามของพระองค์ด้วยเต้นรำ ให้เขาถวายเพลงสรรเสริญแด่พระองค์ด้วยรำมะนาและพิณเขาคู่
word.spanish1909: Alaben su nombre con corro: Con adufe y arpa á él canten.
word.latinvulgate: Laudent nomen ejus in choro, in tympano et psalterio psallant ei.
word.italian1927: Lodino il suo nome con danze, gli salmeggino col timpano e la cetra,
word.german1912: Sie sollen loben seinen Namen im Reigen; mit Pauken und Harfen sollen sie ihm spielen.
word.french1910: Qu'ils louent son nom avec des danses, Qu'ils le célèbrent avec le tambourin et la harpe!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 願他們一邊跳舞，一邊讚美他的名，擊鼓彈琴歌頌他。
word.korean: 춤 추며 그의 이름을 찬양하며 소고와 수금으로 그를 찬양할지어다 !
word.tagalog: Purihin nila ang kaniyang pangalan sa sayaw: magsiawit sila ng mga pagpuri sa kaniya na may pandereta at alpa.
word.maori: Kia whakamoemiti ratou ki tona ingoa me te kanikani ano: kia himene ratou ki a ia i runga i te timipera, i te hapa.
word.cebuano: Ipapagdayeg kanila ang iyang ngalan sa pagsayaw: Paawita sila sa mga pagdayeg kaniya uban ang gagmay nga tambor ug alpa.
word.hebrew: ג  יהללו שמו במחול    בתף וכנור יזמרו-לו
word.hebrewmodern: יהללו שמו במחול בתף וכנור יזמרו לו׃
word.greekot: αἰνεσάτωσαν τὸ ὄνομα αὐτοῦ ἐν χορῷ ἐν τυμπάνῳ καὶ ψαλτηρίῳ ψαλάτωσαν αὐτῷ

word.kjv: Let the high praises of God be in their mouth, and a twoedged sword in their hand;
word.thailand: ให้การสรรเสริญอย่างสูงแด่พระเจ้าอยู่ในปากของเขา และให้ดาบสองคมอยู่ในมือของเขา
word.spanish1909: Ensalzamientos de Dios modularán en sus gargantas. Y espadas de dos filos habrá en sus manos;
word.latinvulgate: Exaltationes Dei in gutture eorum : et gladii ancipites in manibus eorum :
word.italian1927: Abbiano in bocca le alte lodi di Dio, una spada a due tagli in mano
word.german1912: Ihr Mund soll Gott erheben, und sie sollen scharfe Schwerter in ihren Händen haben,
word.french1910: Que les louanges de Dieu soient dans leur bouche, Et le glaive à deux tranchants dans leur main,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 願稱讚　神的話常在他們口中；願他們手裡拿著兩刃的劍，
word.korean: 그 입에는 하나님의 존영이요 그 수중에는 두 날 가진 칼이로다
word.tagalog: Malagay nawa sa kanilang bibig ang pinakamataas na pagpuri sa Dios, at tabak na may dalawang talim sa kanilang kamay;
word.maori: ¶ Kia whai whakamoemiti o ratou mangai ki te Atua, kia whai hoari matarua to ratou ringa;
word.cebuano: Itugot nga ang hataas nga mga pagdayeg sa Dios anha unta sa ilang mga baba, Ug ang espada nga duruhay sulab, sa ilang kamot;
word.hebrew: ו  רוממות אל בגרונם    וחרב פיפיות בידם
word.hebrewmodern: רוממות אל בגרונם וחרב פיפיות בידם׃
word.greekot: αἱ ὑψώσεις τοῦ θεοῦ ἐν τῷ λάρυγγι αὐτῶν καὶ ῥομφαῖαι δίστομοι ἐν ταῖς χερσὶν αὐτῶν

word.kjv: Praise ye the LORD. Praise God in his sanctuary: praise him in the firmament of his power.
word.thailand: จงสรรเสริญพระเยโฮวาห์เถิด จงสรรเสริญพระเจ้าในสถานบริสุทธิ์ของพระองค์ จงสรรเสริญพระองค์ในพื้นฟ้าอันอานุภาพของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Aleluya. ALABAD á Dios en su santuario: Alabadle en la extensión de su fortaleza.
word.latinvulgate: Alleluja. Laudate Dominum in sanctis ejus ; laudate eum in firmamento virtutis ejus.
word.italian1927: Alleluia. Lodate Iddio nel suo santuario, lodatelo nella distesa ove risplende la sua potenza.
word.german1912: Halleluja! Lobet den HERRN in seinem Heiligtum; lobet ihn in der Feste seiner Macht!
word.french1910: Louez l'Eternel! Louez Dieu dans son sanctuaire! Louez-le dans l'étendue, où éclate sa puissance!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 凡有氣息的應當讚美　神你們要讚美耶和華。要在　神的聖所讚美他，要在他顯能力的穹蒼下讚美他。
word.korean: 할렐루야 ! 그 성소에서 하나님을 찬양하며 그 권능의 궁창에서 그를 찬양할지어다 !
word.tagalog: Purihin ninyo ang Panginoon. Purihin ninyo ang Dios sa kaniyang santuario: purihin ninyo siya sa langit ng kaniyang kapangyarihan.
word.maori: ¶ Whakamoemititia a Ihowa. Whakamoemititia te Atua i tona wahi tapu: whakamoemititia ia i te kikorangi o tona kaha.
word.cebuano: Dayegon ninyo si Jehova. Dayega ang Dios nga anaa sa iyang balang puluy-anan: Dayega siya diha sa kalangitan sa iyang gahum.
word.hebrew: א  הללו-יה הללו-אל בקדשו    הללוהו ברקיע עזו
word.hebrewmodern: הללו יה הללו אל בקדשו הללוהו ברקיע עזו׃
word.greekot: αλληλουια αἰνεῖτε τὸν θεὸν ἐν τοῖς ἁγίοις αὐτοῦ αἰνεῖτε αὐτὸν ἐν στερεώματι δυνάμεως αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: Praise him for his mighty acts: praise him according to his excellent greatness.
word.thailand: จงสรรเสริญพระองค์เพราะกิจการอันอานุภาพของพระองค์ จงสรรเสริญพระองค์ตามความยิ่งใหญ่อย่างมากของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Alabadle por sus proezas: Alabadle conforme á la muchedumbre de su grandeza.
word.latinvulgate: Laudate eum in virtutibus ejus ; laudate eum secundum multitudinem magnitudinis ejus.
word.italian1927: Lodatelo per le sue gesta, lodatelo secondo la sua somma grandezza.
word.german1912: Lobet ihn in seinen Taten; lobet ihn in seiner großen Herrlichkeit!
word.french1910: Louez-le pour ses hauts faits! Louez-le selon l'immensité de sa grandeur!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 要因他大能的作為讚美他，要因他無限的偉大讚美他。
word.korean: 그의 능하신 행동을 인하여 찬양하며 그의 지극히 광대하심을 좇아 찬양할지어다 !
word.tagalog: Purihin ninyo siya dahil sa kaniyang mga makapangyarihang gawa: purihin ninyo siya ayon sa kaniyang marilag na kadakilaan.
word.maori: Whakamoemititia ia mo ana mahi nunui: kia rite ki te hira o tona nui te whakamoemiti ki a ia.
word.cebuano: Dayega siya tungod sa iyang mga buhat nga gamhanan: Dayega siya sumala sa iyang labaw nga pagkahalangdon.
word.hebrew: ב  הללוהו בגבורתיו    הללוהו כרב גדלו
word.hebrewmodern: הללוהו בגבורתיו הללוהו כרב גדלו׃
word.greekot: αἰνεῖτε αὐτὸν ἐπὶ ταῖς δυναστείαις αὐτοῦ αἰνεῖτε αὐτὸν κατὰ τὸ πλῆθος τῆς μεγαλωσύνης αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: Praise him with the sound of the trumpet: praise him with the psaltery and harp.
word.thailand: จงสรรเสริญพระองค์ด้วยเสียงแตร จงสรรเสริญพระองค์ด้วยพิณใหญ่และพิณเขาคู่
word.spanish1909: Alabadle á son de bocina: Alabadle con salterio y arpa.
word.latinvulgate: Laudate eum in sono tubæ ; laudate eum in psalterio et cithara.
word.italian1927: Lodatelo col suon della tromba, lodatelo col saltèro e la cetra.
word.german1912: Lobet ihn mit Posaunen; lobet ihn mit Psalter und Harfe!
word.french1910: Louez-le au son de la trompette! Louez-le avec le luth et la harpe!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 要吹角讚美他，要鼓瑟彈琴讚美他。
word.korean: 나팔 소리로 찬양하며 비파와 수금으로 찬양할지어다 !
word.tagalog: Purihin ninyo siya ng tunog ng pakakak: purihin ninyo siya ng salterio at alpa.
word.maori: Whakamoemititia ia i runga i te tangi o te tetere: whakamoemititia ia i runga i te hatere, i te hapa.
word.cebuano: Dayega siya nga adunay huni sa trompeta: Dayega siya nga adunay salterio ug alpa.
word.hebrew: ג  הללוהו בתקע שופר    הללוהו בנבל וכנור

word.hebrew: לא  תנו-לה מפרי ידיה    ויהללוה בשערים מעשיה  {ש}
word.hebrewmodern: תנו לה מפרי ידיה ויהללוה בשערים מעשיה׃
word.greekot: δότε αὐτῇ ἀπὸ καρπῶν χειρῶν αὐτῆς καὶ αἰνείσθω ἐν πύλαις ὁ ἀνὴρ αὐτῆς

word.tagalog: Kaya't aking pinuri ang patay na namatay na, ng higit kay sa may buhay na nabubuhay pa;
word.maori: Na, ko taku whakamoemiti ki te hunga mate kua mate noa ake, nui atu i taku ki te hunga ora e ora nei.
word.cebuano: Busa gidayeg ko ang mga nangamatay nga dugay na nga nangamatay labaw kay sa mga buhi nga mga buhi pa;

word.hebrewmodern: ושבח אני את המתים שכבר מתו מן החיים אשר המה חיים עדנה׃
word.greekot: καὶ ἐπῄνεσα ἐγὼ σὺν τοὺς τεθνηκότας τοὺς ἤδη ἀποθανόντας ὑπὲρ τοὺς ζῶντας ὅσοι αὐτοὶ ζῶσιν ἕως τοῦ νῦν

word.kjv: My dove, my undefiled is but one; she is the only one of her mother, she is the choice one of her that bare her. The daughters saw her, and blessed her; yea, the queens and the concubines, and they praised her.
word.thailand: แม่นกเขาของฉัน แม่คนงามหมดจดของฉัน เป็นคนเดียว เธอเป็นคนเดียวของมารดา เป็นหัวรักหัวใคร่ของผู้ให้กำเนิด สาวๆทั้งหลายเห็นเธอ และเรียกเธอว่า ผาสุก ทั้งเหล่ามเหสีและเหล่านางห้ามก็สรรเสริญเยินยอเธอว่า
word.spanish1909: Mas una es la paloma mía, la perfecta mía; Unica es á su madre, Escogida á la que la engendró. Viéronla las doncellas, y llamáronla bienaventurada; Las reinas y las concubinas, y la alabaron.

word.italian1927: ma la mia colomba, la perfetta mia, è unica; è l’unica di sua madre, la prescelta di colei che l’ha partorita. Le fanciulle la vedono, e la proclaman beata; la vedon pure le regine e le concubine, e la lodano.
word.german1912: Aber eine ist meine Taube, meine Fromme, eine ist ihrer Mutter die Liebste und die Auserwählte ihrer Mutter. Da sie die Töchter sahen, priesen sie dieselbe selig; die Königinnen und Kebsweiber lobten sie.
word.french1910: Une seule est ma colombe, ma parfaite; Elle est l'unique de sa mère, La préférée de celle qui lui donna le jour. Les jeunes filles la voient, et la disent heureuse; Les reines et les concubines aussi, et elles la louent. -
word.korean: 나의 비둘기, 나의 완전한 자는 하나 뿐이로구나 그는 그 어미의 외딸이요 그 낳은 자의 귀중히 여기는 자로구나 여자들이 그를 보고 복된 자라 하고 왕후와 비빈들도 그를 칭찬하는구나
word.tagalog: Ang aking kalapati, ang aking sakdal ay isa lamang; siya ang bugtong ng kaniyang ina; siya ang pili ng nanganak sa kaniya. Nakita siya ng mga anak na babae, at tinawag siyang mapalad; Oo, ng mga reina at ng mga babae, at pinuri siya nila.
word.maori: Ko taku kukupa, ko taku mea pokekore, he mea kotahi noa; ko ia anake ta tona whaea; ko ia te mea i paingia rawatia e te wahine i whanau ai ia: i kite nga tamahine i a ia, kei te manaaki i a ia; ae ra, ko nga kuini me nga wahine iti, whakamoemiti ana ratou ki a ia.
word.cebuano: Ang akong salampati, ang akong ulay, usa lamang ; Siya lamang usa ra gikan sa iyang inahan; Siya mao ang pinili niya niadtong nanganak kaniya. Ang mga anak nga babaye nakakita kaniya, ug nagtawag kaniya nga bulahan; Oo , ang mga reina ug ang mga puyo-puyo, ug sila nanagdayeg kaniya.
word.hebrew: ט אחת היא יונתי תמתי--אחת היא לאמה ברה היא ליולדתה ראוה בנות ויאשרוה מלכות ופילגשים ויהללוה  {ס}
word.hebrewmodern: אחת היא יונתי תמתי אחת היא לאמה ברה היא ליולדתה ראוה בנות ויאשרוה מלכות ופילגשים ויהללוה׃
word.greekot: μία ἐστὶν περιστερά μου τελεία μου μία ἐστὶν τῇ μητρὶ αὐτῆς ἐκλεκτή ἐστιν τῇ τεκούσῃ αὐτῆς εἴδοσαν αὐτὴν θυγατέρες καὶ μακαριοῦσιν αὐτήν βασίλισσαι καὶ παλλακαὶ καὶ αἰνέσουσιν αὐτήν

word.kjv: And in that day thou shalt say, O LORD, I will praise thee: though thou wast angry with me, thine anger is turned away, and thou comfortedst me.
word.thailand: ในวันนั้น ท่านจะกล่าวว่า "ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ ข้าพระองค์จะสรรเสริญพระองค์ เพราะแม้พระองค์ทรงพระพิโรธต่อข้าพระองค์ ความกริ้วของพระองค์ก็หันกลับไป และพระองค์ทรงเล้าโลมข้าพระองค์"
word.spanish1909: Y DIRAS en aquel día: Cantaré á ti, oh Jehová: pues aunque te enojaste contra mí, tu furor se apartó, y me has consolado.
word.latinvulgate: Et dices in die illa : Confitebor tibi, Domine, quoniam iratus es mihi ; conversus est furor tuus, et consolatus es me.
word.italian1927: In quel giorno, dirai: "Io ti celebro, o Eterno! Poiché, dopo esserti adirato con me, l’ira tua s’è calmata, e tu m’hai consolato.
word.german1912: Zu derselben Zeit wirst du sagen: Ich danke dir, HERR, daß du zornig bist gewesen über mich und dein Zorn sich gewendet hat und tröstest mich.
word.french1910: Tu diras en ce jour-là: Je te loue, ô Eternel! Car tu as été irrité contre moi, Ta colère s'est apaisée, et tu m'as consolé.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 稱謝救恩之歌到那日，你必說：“耶和華啊！我要稱謝你，因為你雖曾向我發怒，你的怒氣卻已轉消，你又安慰了我。
word.korean: 그 날에 네가 말하기를 여호와여 주께서 전에는 내게 노하셨사오나 이제는 그 노가 쉬었고 또 나를 안위하시오니 내가 주께 감사하겠나이다 할 것이니라
word.tagalog: At sa araw na yaon ay iyong sasabihin, Ako'y pasasalamat sa iyo, Oh Panginoon; sapagka't bagaman ikaw ay nagalit sa akin ang iyong galit ay napawi, at iyong inaaliw ako.
word.maori: ¶ A i taua ra ka mea koe, Ka whakamoemiti atu ahau ki a koe, e Ihowa: ahakoa hoki i riri koe ki ahau, kua tahuri atu tou riri, a kei te whakamarie koe i ahau.
word.cebuano: Ug niadtong adlawa ikaw magaingon: Pagapasalamatan ko ikaw, Oh Jehova; kay bisan ikaw nasuko kanako, ang imong kasuko gikuha mo, ug ako gilipay mo.
word.hebrew: א ואמרת ביום ההוא אודך יהוה כי אנפת בי ישב אפך ותנחמני
word.hebrewmodern: ואמרת ביום ההוא אודך יהוה כי אנפת בי ישב אפך ותנחמני׃
word.greekot: καὶ ἐρεῖς ἐν τῇ ἡμέρᾳ ἐκείνῃ εὐλογήσω σε κύριε διότι ὠργίσθης μοι καὶ ἀπέστρεψας τὸν θυμόν σου καὶ ἠλέησάς με

word.kjv: O LORD, thou art my God; I will exalt thee, I will praise thy name; for thou hast done wonderful things; thy counsels of old are faithfulness and truth.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ พระองค์ทรงเป็นพระเจ้าของข้าพระองค์ ข้าพระองค์จะยอพระเกียรติพระองค์ ข้าพระองค์จะสรรเสริญพระนามของพระองค์ เพราะพระองค์ได้ทรงกระทำการมหัศจรรย์ แผนงานที่พระองค์ทรงดำริไว้นานมาแล้วก็สัตย์ซื่อและเป็นความจริง
word.spanish1909: JEHOVA, tú eres mi Dios: te ensalzaré, alabaré tu nombre; porque has hecho maravillas, los consejos antiguos, la verdad firme.
word.latinvulgate: Domine, Deus meus es tu ; exaltabo te, et confitebor nomini tuo : quoniam fecisti mirabilia, cogitationes antiquas fideles. Amen.
word.italian1927: O Eterno, tu sei il mio Dio; io t’esalterò, celebrerò il tuo nome, perché hai fatto cose maravigliose; i tuoi disegni, concepiti da tempo, sono fedeli e stabili.
word.german1912: HERR, du bist mein Gott! dich preise ich; ich lobe deinen Namen, denn du tust Wunder; dein Ratschlüsse von alters her sind treu und wahrhaftig.
word.french1910: O Eternel! tu es mon Dieu; Je t'exalterai, je célébrerai ton nom, Car tu as fait des choses merveilleuses; Tes desseins conçus à l'avance se sont fidèlement accomplis.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 稱頌的詩歌耶和華啊！你是我的　神，我要尊崇你，稱謝你的名，因為你以信實真誠作成了奇妙的事，就是你遠古以前所計劃的事。
word.korean: 여호와여, 주는 나의 하나님이시라 내가 주를 높이고 주의 이름을 찬송하오리니 주는 기사를 옛적의 정하신 뜻대로 성실함과 진실함으로 행하셨음이라
word.tagalog: Oh Panginoon, ikaw ay aking Dios; aking ibubunyi ka, aking pupurihin ang iyong pangalan; sapagka't ikaw ay gumawa ng kagilagilalas na bagay, sa makatuwid baga'y ang iyong binalak noong una, sa pagtatapat at katotohanan.
word.maori: ¶ E Ihowa, ko koe toku Atua; ka whakanuia koe e ahau, ka whakamoemititia e ahau tou ingoa; he mahi whakamiharo hoki au, ara ko nga whakaaro i takoto nei i mua, i runga i te pono, i te tika.
word.cebuano: Oh Jehova, ikaw mao ang akong Dios; ituboy ko ikaw, pagadayegon ko ang imong ngalan; kay nakahimo ka ug mga butang nga katingalahan, ang imong mga pagtambag sa karaang panahon, sa pagkamatinumanon ug sa kamatuoran.
word.hebrew: א יהוה אלהי אתה--ארוממך אודה שמך כי עשית פלא  עצות מרחק אמונה אמן
word.hebrewmodern: יהוה אלהי אתה ארוממך אודה שמך כי עשית פלא עצות מרחוק אמונה אמן׃
word.greekot: κύριε ὁ θεός μου δοξάσω σε ὑμνήσω τὸ ὄνομά σου ὅτι ἐποίησας θαυμαστὰ πράγματα βουλὴν ἀρχαίαν ἀληθινήν γένοιτο κύριε

word.kjv: For the grave cannot praise thee, death can not celebrate thee: they that go down into the pit cannot hope for thy truth.
word.thailand: เพราะแดนคนตายสรรเสริญพระองค์ไม่ได้ ความมรณายกย่องพระองค์ไม่ได้ บรรดาคนที่ลงไปยังปากแดนคนตายนั้น จะหวังในความจริงของพระองค์ไม่ได้
word.spanish1909: Porque el sepulcro no te celebrará, ni te alabará la muerte; Ni los que descienden al hoyo esperarán tu verdad.
word.latinvulgate: Quia non infernus confitebitur tibi, neque mors laudabit te : non exspectabunt qui descendunt in lacum veritatem tuam.
word.italian1927: Poiché non è il soggiorno de’ morti che possa lodarti, non è la morte che ti possa celebrare; quei che scendon nella fossa non possono più sperare nella tua fedeltà.
word.german1912: Denn die Hölle lobt dich nicht; so rühmt dich der Tod nicht, und die in die Grube fahren, warten nicht auf deine Wahrheit;
word.french1910: Ce n'est pas le séjour des morts qui te loue, Ce n'est pas la mort qui te célèbre; Ceux qui sont descendus dans la fosse n'espèrent plus en ta fidélité.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 陰間不能稱謝你，死亡不能讚美你，下坑的人都不能仰望你的信實。
word.korean: 음부가 주께 사례하지 못하며 사망이 주를 찬양하지 못하며 구덩이에 들어간 자가 주의 신실을 바라지 못하되
word.tagalog: Sapagka't hindi ka maaring purihin ng Sheol, hindi ka maaring ipagdiwang ng kamatayan! Silang nagsisibaba sa hukay ay hindi makaaasa sa iyong katotohanan.
word.maori: E kore hoki e taea e te reinga te whakawhetai ki a koe, e kore te mate e ahei te whakamoemiti ki a koe; ko te hunga e heke ana ki te rua kahore o ratou tumanako ki tou pono.
word.cebuano: Kay ang Sheol dili makadayeg kanimo, ang kamatayon dili makag-pasidungog kanimo: Sila nga manaug sa gahong dili makalaum sa imong kamatuoran.
word.hebrew: יח כי לא שאול תודך מות יהללך לא ישברו יורדי בור אל אמתך
word.hebrewmodern: כי לא שאול תודך מות יהללך לא ישברו יורדי בור אל אמתך׃
word.greekot: οὐ γὰρ οἱ ἐν ᾅδου αἰνέσουσίν σε οὐδὲ οἱ ἀποθανόντες εὐλογήσουσίν σε οὐδὲ ἐλπιοῦσιν οἱ ἐν ᾅδου τὴν ἐλεημοσύνην σου

word.kjv: The living, the living, he shall praise thee, as I do this day: the father to the children shall make known thy truth.
word.thailand: คนเป็น คนเป็น เขาจะสรรเสริญพระองค์ อย่างที่ข้าพระองค์กระทำในวันนี้ บิดาจะได้สำแดงความจริงของพระองค์แก่ลูกของเขา
word.spanish1909: El que vive, el que vive, éste te confesará, como yo hoy: El padre hará notoria tu verdad á los hijos.
word.latinvulgate: Vivens, vivens ipse confitebitur tibi, sicut et ego hodie ; pater filiis notam faciet veritatem tuam.
word.italian1927: Il vivente, il vivente è quel che ti loda, come fo io quest’oggi; il padre farà conoscere ai suoi figliuoli la tua fedeltà.
word.german1912: sondern allein, die da leben, loben dich, wie ich jetzt tue. Der Vater wird den Kindern deine Wahrheit kundtun.
word.french1910: Le vivant, le vivant, c'est celui-là qui te loue, Comme moi aujourd'hui; Le père fait connaître à ses enfants ta fidélité.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 只有活人才能稱謝你，像我今日一樣；作父親的，要讓兒女知道你的信實。
word.korean: 오직 산 자 곧 산 자는 오늘날 내가 하는 것과 같이 주께 감사하며 주의 신실을 아비가 그 자녀에게 알게 하리이다
word.tagalog: Ang buhay, ang buhay, siya'y pupuri sa iyo, gaya ng ginagawa ko sa araw na ito: Ang ama sa mga anak ay magpapatalastas ng iyong katotohanan.
word.maori: Ko te tangata ora, ko te tangata ora, mana te whakawhetai ki a koe, te penei me taku nei i tenei ra: tera tou pono ka whakakitea e te matua ki nga tamariki.
word.cebuano: Ang buhi, ang buhi, siya magadayeg kanimo, ingon sa akong ginahimo niining adlawa: Ang amahan mopaila sa iyang mga anak sa imong kamatuoran.
word.hebrew: יט חי חי הוא יודך כמוני היום אב לבנים יודיע אל אמתך
word.hebrewmodern: חי חי הוא יודך כמוני היום אב לבנים יודיע אל אמתך׃
word.greekot: οἱ ζῶντως εὐλογήσουσίν σε ὃν τρόπον κἀγώ ἀπὸ γὰρ τῆς σήμερον παιδία ποιήσω ἃ ἀναγγελοῦσιν τὴν δικαιοσύνην σου

word.kjv: I am the LORD: that is my name: and my glory will I not give to another, neither my praise to graven images.
word.thailand: เราคือเยโฮวาห์ นั่นเป็นนามของเรา สง่าราศีของเรา เรามิได้ให้แก่ผู้อื่น หรือให้คำที่สรรเสริญเราแก่รูปแกะสลัก
word.spanish1909: Yo Jehová: este es mi nombre; y á otro no daré mi gloria, ni mi alabanza á esculturas.
